60 static void HSVtoRGB(float h, float s, float v, float rgb[3])
61 {
62  int i;
63  float f;
64  float p, q, t;
65 
66  h *= 5;
67 
68  i = floor(h);
69  f = h - i;
70 
71  p = v * (1 - s);
72  q = v * (1 - s * f);
73  t = v * (1 - s * (1 - f));
74 
75  switch (i)
76  {
77  case 0:
78  rgb[0] = v;
79  rgb[1] = t;
80  rgb[2] = p;
81  break;
82  case 1:
83  rgb[0] = q;
84  rgb[1] = v;
85  rgb[2] = p;
86  break;
87  case 2:
88  rgb[0] = p;
89  rgb[1] = v;
90  rgb[2] = t;
91  break;
92  case 3:
93  rgb[0] = p;
94  rgb[1] = q;
95  rgb[2] = v;
96  break;
97  case 4:
98  rgb[0] = t;
99  rgb[1] = p;
100  rgb[2] = v;
101  break;
102  case 5:
103  rgb[0] = v;
104  rgb[1] = p;
105  rgb[2] = q;
106  break;
107  }
108 }
109 
115 static void R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(byte in[4], byte out[4])
116 {
117  // shift the color data based on overbright range
118  int shift = r_mapOverBrightBits->integer - tr.overbrightBits;
119  // shift the data based on overbright range
120  int r = in[0] << shift;
121  int g = in[1] << shift;
122  int b = in[2] << shift;
123 
124  // normalize by color instead of saturating to white
125  if ((r | g | b) > 255)
126  {
127  int max = r > g ? r : g;
128 
129  max = max > b ? max : b;
130  r = r * 255 / max;
131  g = g * 255 / max;
132  b = b * 255 / max;
133  }
134 
135  out[0] = (byte)r;
136  out[1] = (byte)g;
137  out[2] = (byte)b;
138  out[3] = in[3];
139 }
140 
146 static void R_ColorShiftLightingFloats(const vec4_t in, vec4_t out)
147 {
148  int shift, r, g, b;
149 
150  // shift the color data based on overbright range
151  shift = tr.mapOverBrightBits - tr.overbrightBits;
152 
153  // shift the data based on overbright range
154  r = ((byte)(in[0] * 255)) << shift;
155  g = ((byte)(in[1] * 255)) << shift;
156  b = ((byte)(in[2] * 255)) << shift;
157 
158  // normalize by color instead of saturating to white
159  if ((r | g | b) > 255)
160  {
161  int max;
162 
163  max = r > g ? r : g;
164  max = max > b ? max : b;
165  r = r * 255 / max;
166  g = g * 255 / max;
167  b = b * 255 / max;
168  }
169 
170  out[0] = r * (1.0f / 255.0f);
171  out[1] = g * (1.0f / 255.0f);
172  out[2] = b * (1.0f / 255.0f);
173  out[3] = in[3];
174 }
175 
185 float R_ProcessLightmap(byte *pic, int in_padding, int width, int height, byte *pic_out)
186 {
187  int j;
188  float maxIntensity = 0;
189 
190  if (r_showLightMaps->integer > 1) // color code by intensity as development tool (FIXME: check range)
191  {
192  //double sumIntensity = 0;
193  float r, g, b, intensity;
194  float out[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
195 
196  for (j = 0; j < width * height; j++)
197  {
198  r = pic[j * in_padding + 0];
199  g = pic[j * in_padding + 1];
200  b = pic[j * in_padding + 2];
201 
202  intensity = 0.33f * r + 0.685f * g + 0.063f * b;
203 
204  if (intensity > 255)
205  {
206  intensity = 1.0f;
207  }
208  else
209  {
210  intensity /= 255.0f;
211  }
212 
213  if (intensity > maxIntensity)
214  {
215  maxIntensity = intensity;
216  }
217 
218  HSVtoRGB(intensity, 1.00, 0.50, out);
219 
220  if (r_showLightMaps->integer == 3)
221  {
222  // Arnout: artists wanted the colours to be inversed
223  pic_out[j * 4 + 0] = (byte)(out[2] * 255);
224  pic_out[j * 4 + 1] = (byte)(out[1] * 255);
225  pic_out[j * 4 + 2] = (byte)(out[0] * 255);
226  }
227  else
228  {
229  pic_out[j * 4 + 0] = (byte)(out[0] * 255);
230  pic_out[j * 4 + 1] = (byte)(out[1] * 255);
231  pic_out[j * 4 + 2] = (byte)(out[2] * 255);
232  }
233  pic_out[j * 4 + 3] = 255;
234 
235  //sumIntensity += intensity;
236  }
237  }
238  else
239  {
240  for (j = 0; j < width * height; j++)
241  {
242  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(&pic[j * in_padding], &pic_out[j * 4]);
243  pic_out[j * 4 + 3] = 255;
244  }
245  }
246 
247  return maxIntensity;
248 }
249 
256 static int QDECL LightmapNameCompare(const void *a, const void *b)
257 {
258  int c1, c2;
259  char *s1 = *(char **)a;
260  char *s2 = *(char **)b;
261 
262  do
263  {
264  c1 = *s1++;
265  c2 = *s2++;
266 
267  if (c1 >= 'a' && c1 <= 'z')
268  {
269  c1 -= ('a' - 'A');
270  }
271  if (c2 >= 'a' && c2 <= 'z')
272  {
273  c2 -= ('a' - 'A');
274  }
275 
276  if (c1 == '\\' || c1 == ':')
277  {
278  c1 = '/';
279  }
280  if (c2 == '\\' || c2 == ':')
281  {
282  c2 = '/';
283  }
284 
285  if (c1 < c2)
286  {
287  // strings not equal
288  return -1;
289  }
290  if (c1 > c2)
291  {
292  return 1;
293  }
294  }
295  while (c1);
296 
297  // strings are equal
298  return 0;
299 }
300 
301 /*
302  * @brief Standard conversion from rgbe to float pixels
303  * @param[out] red
304  * @param[out] green
305  * @param[out] blue
306  * @param[in] rgbe
307  *
308  * @note Ward uses ldexp(col+0.5,exp-(128+8)). However we wanted pixels
309  * in the range [0,1] to map back into the range [0,1].
310  *
311  * @note Unused
312 static ID_INLINE void rgbe2float(float *red, float *green, float *blue, unsigned char rgbe[4])
313 {
314  float e;
315  float f;
316 
317  if (rgbe[3]) // nonzero pixel
318  {
319  f = ldexp(1.0, rgbe[3] - (int)(128 + 8)); // FIXME: never read
320  //f = ldexp(1.0, rgbe[3] - 128) / 10.0;
321  e = (rgbe[3] - 128) / 4.0f;
322 
323  // RB: exp2 not defined by MSVC
324  //f = exp2(e);
325  f = pow(2, e);
326 
327  //decoded = rgbe.rgb * exp2(fExp);
328  *red = (rgbe[0] / 255.0f) * f;
329  *green = (rgbe[1] / 255.0f) * f;
330  *blue = (rgbe[2] / 255.0f) * f;
331  }
332  else
333  {
334  *red = *green = *blue = 0.0;
335  }
336 }
337 */
338 
349 void LoadRGBEToFloats(const char *name, float **pic, int *width, int *height, qboolean doGamma, qboolean toneMap,
350  qboolean compensate)
351 {
352  int i, j;
353  byte *buf_p;
354  byte *buffer;
355  float *floatbuf;
356  char *token;
357  int w, h, c;
358  qboolean formatFound;
359  //unsigned char rgbe[4];
360  //float red;
361  //float green;
362  //float blue;
363  //float max;
364  //float inv, dif;
365  float exposure = 1.6f;
366  //float exposureGain = 1.0;
367  const vec3_t LUMINANCE_VECTOR = { 0.2125f, 0.7154f, 0.0721f };
368  float luminance;
369  float avgLuminance;
370  float maxLuminance;
371  float scaledLuminance;
372  float finalLuminance;
373  double sum;
374  float gamma;
375 
376  union
377  {
378  byte b[4];
379  float f;
380  } sample;
381  vec4_t sampleVector;
382 
383  *pic = NULL;
384 
385  // load the file
386  ri.FS_ReadFile(name, (void **)&buffer);
387  if (!buffer)
388  {
389  Ren_Drop("LoadRGBE: '%s' not found\n", name);
390  }
391 
392  buf_p = buffer;
393 
394  formatFound = qfalse;
395  w = h = 0;
396  while (qtrue)
397  {
398  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qtrue);
399  if (!token[0])
400  {
401  break;
402  }
403 
404  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "FORMAT"))
405  {
406  //Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: FORMAT found\n");
407 
408  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
409  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "="))
410  {
411  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
412  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "32"))
413  {
414  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
415  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "-"))
416  {
417  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
418  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "bit_rle_rgbe"))
419  {
420  formatFound = qtrue;
421  }
422  else
423  {
424  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected 'bit_rle_rgbe' found instead '%s'\n", token);
425  }
426  }
427  else
428  {
429  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected '-' found instead '%s'\n", token);
430  }
431  }
432  else
433  {
434  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected '32' found instead '%s'\n", token);
435  }
436  }
437  else
438  {
439  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected '=' found instead '%s'\n", token);
440  }
441  }
442 
443  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "-"))
444  {
445  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
446  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "Y"))
447  {
448  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
449  w = atoi(token);
450 
451  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
452  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "+"))
453  {
454  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
455  if (!Q_stricmp(token, "X"))
456  {
457  token = COM_ParseExt2((char **)&buf_p, qfalse);
458  h = atoi(token);
459  break;
460  }
461  else
462  {
463  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected 'X' found instead '%s'\n", token);
464  }
465  }
466  else
467  {
468  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected '+' found instead '%s'\n", token);
469  }
470  }
471  else
472  {
473  Ren_Print("LoadRGBE: Expected 'Y' found instead '%s'\n", token);
474  }
475  }
476  }
477 
478  // go to the first byte
479  while ((c = *buf_p++) != 0)
480  {
481  if (c == '\n')
482  {
483  //buf_p++;
484  break;
485  }
486  }
487 
488  if (width)
489  {
490  *width = w;
491  }
492  if (height)
493  {
494  *height = h;
495  }
496 
497  if (!formatFound)
498  {
499  ri.FS_FreeFile(buffer);
500  Ren_Drop("LoadRGBE: %s has no format\n", name);
501  }
502 
503  if (!w || !h)
504  {
505  ri.FS_FreeFile(buffer);
506  Ren_Drop("LoadRGBE: %s has an invalid image size\n", name);
507  }
508 
509  *pic = (float *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(w * h * 3 * sizeof(float));
510  floatbuf = *pic;
511  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
512  {
513 #if 0
514  rgbe[0] = *buf_p++;
515  rgbe[1] = *buf_p++;
516  rgbe[2] = *buf_p++;
517  rgbe[3] = *buf_p++;
518 
519  rgbe2float(&red, &green, &blue, rgbe);
520 
521  *floatbuf++ = red;
522  *floatbuf++ = green;
523  *floatbuf++ = blue;
524 #else
525  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
526  {
527  sample.b[0] = *buf_p++;
528  sample.b[1] = *buf_p++;
529  sample.b[2] = *buf_p++;
530  sample.b[3] = *buf_p++;
531 
532  *floatbuf++ = sample.f / 255.0f; // FIXME XMap2's output is 255 times too high
533  }
534 #endif
535  }
536 
537  // LOADING DONE
538  if (doGamma)
539  {
540  floatbuf = *pic;
541  gamma = 1.0f / r_hdrLightmapGamma->value;
542  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
543  {
544  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
545  {
546  //*floatbuf = pow(*floatbuf / 255.0f, gamma) * 255.0f;
547  *floatbuf = pow(*floatbuf, gamma);
548  floatbuf++;
549  }
550  }
551  }
552 
553  if (toneMap)
554  {
555  // calculate the average and maximum luminance
556  sum = 0.0;
557  maxLuminance = 0.0f;
558  floatbuf = *pic;
559  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
560  {
561  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
562  {
563  sampleVector[j] = *floatbuf++;
564  }
565 
566  luminance = DotProduct(sampleVector, LUMINANCE_VECTOR) + 0.0001f;
567  if (luminance > maxLuminance)
568  {
569  maxLuminance = luminance;
570  }
571 
572  sum += log(luminance);
573  }
574  sum /= (w * h);
575  avgLuminance = exp(sum);
576 
577  // post process buffer with tone mapping
578  floatbuf = *pic;
579  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
580  {
581  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
582  {
583  sampleVector[j] = *floatbuf++;
584  }
585 
586  if (r_hdrLightmapExposure->value <= 0)
587  {
588  exposure = (r_hdrKey->value / avgLuminance);
589  }
590  else
591  {
592  exposure = r_hdrLightmapExposure->value;
593  }
594 
595  scaledLuminance = exposure * DotProduct(sampleVector, LUMINANCE_VECTOR);
596 #if 0
597  finalLuminance = scaledLuminance / (scaledLuminance + 1.0);
598 #elif 0
599  finalLuminance = (scaledLuminance * (scaledLuminance / maxLuminance + 1.0)) / (scaledLuminance + 1.0);
600 #elif 0
601  finalLuminance =
602  (scaledLuminance * ((scaledLuminance / (maxLuminance * maxLuminance)) + 1.0)) / (scaledLuminance + 1.0);
603 #else
604  // exponential tone mapping
605  finalLuminance = 1.0 - exp(-scaledLuminance);
606 #endif
607 
608  //VectorScale(sampleVector, scaledLuminance * (scaledLuminance / maxLuminance + 1.0) / (scaledLuminance + 1.0), sampleVector);
609  //VectorScale(sampleVector, scaledLuminance / (scaledLuminance + 1.0), sampleVector);
610 
611  VectorScale(sampleVector, finalLuminance, sampleVector);
612 
613  floatbuf -= 3;
614  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
615  {
616  *floatbuf++ = sampleVector[j];
617  }
618  }
619  }
620 
621  if (compensate)
622  {
623  floatbuf = *pic;
624  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
625  {
626  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
627  {
628  *floatbuf = *floatbuf / r_hdrLightmapCompensate->value;
629  floatbuf++;
630  }
631  }
632  }
633 
634  ri.FS_FreeFile(buffer);
635 }
645 void LoadRGBEToHalfs(const char *name, unsigned short **halfImage, int *width, int *height)
646 {
647  ri.Error(ERR_VID_FATAL, "LoadRGBEToHalfs in tr_bsp.cpp is not done yet");
648 }
649 
657 static void LoadRGBEToBytes(const char *name, byte **ldrImage, int *width, int *height)
658 {
659  int i, j;
660  int w, h;
661  float *hdrImage;
662  float *floatbuf;
663  byte *pixbuf;
664  vec3_t sample;
665  float max;
666 
667 #if 0
668  w = h = 0;
669  LoadRGBEToFloats(name, &hdrImage, &w, &h, qtrue, qtrue, qtrue);
670 
671  *width = w;
672  *height = h;
673 
674  *ldrImage = ri.Malloc(w * h * 4);
675  pixbuf = *ldrImage;
676 
677  floatbuf = hdrImage;
678  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
679  {
680  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
681  {
682  sample[j] = *floatbuf++;
683  }
684 
685  NormalizeColor(sample, sample);
686 
687  *pixbuf++ = (byte) (sample[0] * 255);
688  *pixbuf++ = (byte) (sample[1] * 255);
689  *pixbuf++ = (byte) (sample[2] * 255);
690  *pixbuf++ = (byte) 255;
691  }
692 #else
693  w = h = 0;
694  LoadRGBEToFloats(name, &hdrImage, &w, &h, qfalse, qfalse, qfalse);
695 
696  *width = w;
697  *height = h;
698 
699  *ldrImage = (byte *)ri.Z_Malloc(w * h * 4);
700  pixbuf = *ldrImage;
701 
702  floatbuf = hdrImage;
703  for (i = 0; i < (w * h); i++)
704  {
705  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
706  {
707  sample[j] = *floatbuf++ *255.0f;
708  }
709 
710  // clamp with color normalization
711  max = sample[0];
712  if (sample[1] > max)
713  {
714  max = sample[1];
715  }
716  if (sample[2] > max)
717  {
718  max = sample[2];
719  }
720  if (max > 255.0f)
721  {
722  VectorScale(sample, (255.0f / max), sample);
723  }
724 
725  *pixbuf++ = (byte) sample[0];
726  *pixbuf++ = (byte) sample[1];
727  *pixbuf++ = (byte) sample[2];
728  *pixbuf++ = (byte) 255;
729  }
730 #endif
731 
732  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(hdrImage);
733 }
734 
735 #define LIGHTMAP_SIZE 128
736 
741 static void R_LoadLightmapsInternal(lump_t *l, const char *bspName)
742 {
743  unsigned int len = l->filelen;
744  image_t *image;
745  int i, j;
746  static byte data[LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE * 4], *buf, *buf_p;
747 
748  buf = fileBase + l->fileofs;
749 
750  // we are about to upload textures
751  R_IssuePendingRenderCommands();
752 
753  // create all the lightmaps
754  tr.numLightmaps = len / (LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE * 3);
755 
756  Ren_Developer("...loading %i lightmaps\n", tr.numLightmaps);
757 
758  for (i = 0; i < tr.numLightmaps; i++)
759  {
760  // expand the 24 bit on-disk to 32 bit
761  buf_p = buf + i * LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE * 3;
762 
763  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping)
764  {
765  if (i % 2 == 0)
766  {
767  for (j = 0; j < LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE; j++)
768  {
769  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(&buf_p[j * 3], &data[j * 4]);
770  data[j * 4 + 3] = 255;
771  }
772  image = R_CreateImage(va("_lightmap%d", i), data, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, IF_LIGHTMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION, FT_DEFAULT, WT_EDGE_CLAMP);
773  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
774  }
775  else
776  {
777  for (j = 0; j < LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE; j++)
778  {
779  data[j * 4 + 0] = buf_p[j * 3 + 0];
780  data[j * 4 + 1] = buf_p[j * 3 + 1];
781  data[j * 4 + 2] = buf_p[j * 3 + 2];
782  data[j * 4 + 3] = 255;
783  }
784  image = R_CreateImage(va("_lightmap%d", i), data, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, IF_NORMALMAP, FT_DEFAULT, WT_EDGE_CLAMP);
785  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.deluxemaps, image);
786  }
787  }
788  else
789  {*/
790  for (j = 0; j < LIGHTMAP_SIZE * LIGHTMAP_SIZE; j++)
791  {
792  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(&buf_p[j * 3], &data[j * 4]);
793  data[j * 4 + 3] = 255;
794  }
795  image = R_CreateImage(va("_lightmap%d", i), data, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, LIGHTMAP_SIZE, IF_LIGHTMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION, FT_DEFAULT, WT_EDGE_CLAMP);
796  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
797  //}
798  }
799 }
800 
806 static void R_LoadLightmapsExternal(lump_t *l, const char *bspName)
807 {
808  image_t *image;
809  int i;
810  int numLightmaps;
811  char mapName[MAX_QPATH];
812  char **lightmapFiles;
813 
814  Q_strncpyz(mapName, bspName, sizeof(mapName));
815  COM_StripExtension(mapName, mapName, sizeof(mapName));
816 
817  if (tr.worldHDR_RGBE)
818  {
819  // we are about to upload textures
820  R_IssuePendingRenderCommands();
821 
822  // load HDR lightmaps
823  lightmapFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles(mapName, ".hdr", &numLightmaps);
824 
825  if (!lightmapFiles || !numLightmaps)
826  {
827  Ren_Warning("WARNING: no lightmap files found for map %s\n", mapName);
828  return;
829  }
830 
831  qsort(lightmapFiles, numLightmaps, sizeof(char *), LightmapNameCompare);
832 
833  Ren_Developer("...loading %i HDR lightmaps\n", numLightmaps);
834 
835  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && r_hdrLightmap->integer && glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable &&
836  glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable && glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable && glConfig2.textureHalfFloatAvailable)
837  {
838  int width, height;
839  unsigned short *hdrImage = NULL;
840 
841  for (i = 0; i < numLightmaps; i++)
842  {
843  Ren_Developer("...loading external lightmap as RGB 16 bit half HDR '%s/%s'\n", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]);
844 
845  width = height = 0;
846  //LoadRGBEToFloats(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), &hdrImage, &width, &height, qtrue, qfalse, qtrue);
847  LoadRGBEToHalfs(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), &hdrImage, &width, &height);
848 
849  //Ren_Print("...converted '%s/%s' to HALF format\n", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]);
850 
851  image = R_AllocImage(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), qtrue);
852  if (!image)
853  {
854  Com_Dealloc(hdrImage);
855  break;
856  }
857 
858  //Q_strncpyz(image->name, );
859  image->type = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
860 
861  image->width = width;
862  image->height = height;
863 
864  image->bits = IF_NOPICMIP | IF_RGBA16F;
865  image->filterType = FT_NEAREST;
866  image->wrapType = WT_EDGE_CLAMP;
867 
868  GL_Bind(image);
869 
870  image->internalFormat = GL_RGBA16F_ARB;
871  image->uploadWidth = width;
872  image->uploadHeight = height;
873 
874  glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB16F_ARB, width, height, 0, GL_RGB, GL_HALF_FLOAT_ARB, hdrImage);
875 
876  if (glConfig2.generateMipmapAvailable)
877  {
878  //glHint(GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP_HINT_SGIS, GL_NICEST); // make sure its nice
879  glTexParameteri(image->type, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP_SGIS, GL_TRUE);
880  glTexParameteri(image->type, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR); // default to trilinear
881  }
882 
883 
884  glTexParameterf(image->type, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
885  glTexParameterf(image->type, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
886 
887  glTexParameterf(image->type, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
888  glTexParameterf(image->type, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
889 
890  glBindTexture(image->type, 0);
891 
892  GL_CheckErrors();
893 
894  Com_Dealloc(hdrImage);
895 
896  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
897  }
898  }
899  else
900  {
901  int width, height;
902  byte *ldrImage;
903 
904  for (i = 0; i < numLightmaps; i++)
905  {
906  Ren_Developer("...loading external lightmap as RGB8 LDR '%s/%s'\n", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]);
907 
908  width = height = 0;
909  LoadRGBEToBytes(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), &ldrImage, &width, &height);
910 
911  image = R_CreateImage(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), (byte *)ldrImage, width, height,
912  IF_NOPICMIP | IF_LIGHTMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION, FT_DEFAULT, WT_EDGE_CLAMP);
913 
914  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
915 
916  ri.Free(ldrImage);
917  }
918  }
919  }
920 
921  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping)
922  {
923  // load deluxemaps
924  lightmapFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles(mapName, ".png", &numLightmaps);
925 
926  if (!lightmapFiles || !numLightmaps)
927  {
928  lightmapFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles(mapName, ".tga", &numLightmaps);
929 
930  if (!lightmapFiles || !numLightmaps)
931  {
932  Ren_Warning("WARNING: no lightmap files found\n");
933  return;
934  }
935  }
936 
937  qsort(lightmapFiles, numLightmaps, sizeof(char *), LightmapNameCompare);
938 
939  Ren_Developer("...loading %i deluxemaps\n", numLightmaps);
940 
941  for (i = 0; i < numLightmaps; i++)
942  {
943  Ren_Developer("...loading external lightmap '%s/%s'\n", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]);
944 
945  image = R_FindImageFile(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), IF_NORMALMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION | IF_NOPICMIP, FT_DEFAULT, WT_EDGE_CLAMP, NULL);
946  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.deluxemaps, image);
947  }
948  }
949  }*/
950 
951  //{
952  /*lightmapFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles(mapName, ".png", &numLightmaps);
953 
954  if (!lightmapFiles || !numLightmaps)
955  {*/
956  lightmapFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles(mapName, ".tga", &numLightmaps);
957 
958  if (!lightmapFiles || !numLightmaps)
959  {
960  Ren_Warning("WARNING: no lightmap files found for %s\n", mapName);
961  return;
962  }
963  //}
964 
965  qsort(lightmapFiles, numLightmaps, sizeof(char *), LightmapNameCompare);
966 
967  Ren_Developer("...loading %i lightmaps\n", numLightmaps);
968 
969  // we are about to upload textures
970  R_IssuePendingRenderCommands();
971 
972  for (i = 0; i < numLightmaps; i++)
973  {
974  Ren_Developer("...loading external lightmap '%s/%s'\n", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]);
975 
976  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping)
977  {
978  if (i % 2 == 0)
979  {
980  Ren_Developer("Loading lightmap\n");
981  image = R_FindImageFile(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), IF_LIGHTMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION | IF_NOPICMIP, FT_LINEAR, WT_EDGE_CLAMP, NULL);
982  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
983  }
984  else
985  {
986  Ren_Developer("Loading deluxemap\n");
987  image = R_FindImageFile(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), IF_NORMALMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION | IF_NOPICMIP, FT_LINEAR, WT_EDGE_CLAMP, NULL);
988  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.deluxemaps, image);
989  }
990  }
991  else
992  {*/
993  Ren_Developer("Loading lightmap\n");
994  image = R_FindImageFile(va("%s/%s", mapName, lightmapFiles[i]), IF_LIGHTMAP | IF_NOCOMPRESSION | IF_NOPICMIP, FT_LINEAR, WT_EDGE_CLAMP, NULL);
995  Com_AddToGrowList(&tr.lightmaps, image);
996  }
997 
998 
999 }
1000 
1006 static void R_LoadLightmaps(lump_t *l, const char *bspName)
1007 {
1008  tr.fatLightmapSize = 0;
1009 
1010  if (!l->filelen)
1011  {
1012  R_LoadLightmapsExternal(l, bspName);
1013  }
1014  else
1015  {
1016  R_LoadLightmapsInternal(l, bspName);
1017  }
1018 }
1019 
1025 void RE_SetWorldVisData(const byte *vis)
1026 {
1027  tr.externalVisData = vis;
1028 }
1029 
1034 static void R_LoadVisibility(lump_t *l)
1035 {
1036  unsigned int len;
1037  byte *buf;
1038 
1039  Ren_Developer("...loading visibility\n");
1040 
1041  len = PAD(s_worldData.numClusters, 64);
1042  s_worldData.novis = (byte *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(len, h_low);
1043  Com_Memset(s_worldData.novis, 0xff, len);
1044 
1045  len = l->filelen;
1046  if (!len)
1047  {
1048  return;
1049  }
1050  buf = fileBase + l->fileofs;
1051 
1052  s_worldData.numClusters = LittleLong(((int *)buf)[0]);
1053  s_worldData.clusterBytes = LittleLong(((int *)buf)[1]);
1054 
1055  // CM_Load should have given us the vis data to share, so
1056  // we don't need to allocate another copy
1057  if (tr.externalVisData)
1058  {
1059  s_worldData.vis = tr.externalVisData;
1060  }
1061  else
1062  {
1063  byte *dest;
1064 
1065  dest = (byte *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(len - 8, h_low);
1066  Com_Memcpy(dest, buf + 8, len - 8);
1067  s_worldData.vis = dest;
1068  }
1069 }
1070 
1071 //===============================================================================
1072 
1078 static shader_t *ShaderForShaderNum(int shaderNum)
1079 {
1080  shader_t *shader;
1081  dshader_t *dsh;
1082 
1083  shaderNum = LittleLong(shaderNum) + 0; // silence the warning
1084  if (shaderNum < 0 || shaderNum >= s_worldData.numShaders)
1085  {
1086  Ren_Drop("ShaderForShaderNum: bad num %i", shaderNum);
1087  }
1088  dsh = &s_worldData.shaders[shaderNum];
1089 
1090  //Ren_Print("ShaderForShaderNum: '%s'\n", dsh->shader);
1091 
1092  shader = R_FindShader(dsh->shader, SHADER_3D_STATIC, qtrue);
1093 
1094  // if the shader had errors, just use default shader
1095  if (shader->defaultShader)
1096  {
1097  //Ren_Print("failed\n");
1098  return tr.defaultShader;
1099  }
1100 
1101  //Ren_Print("success\n");
1102  return shader;
1103 }
1104 
1112 static void SphereFromBounds(vec3_t mins, vec3_t maxs, vec3_t origin, float *radius)
1113 {
1114  vec3_t temp;
1115 
1116  VectorAdd(mins, maxs, origin);
1117  VectorScale(origin, 0.5f, origin);
1118  VectorSubtract(maxs, origin, temp);
1119  *radius = VectorLength(temp);
1120 }
1121 
1128 static void FinishGenericSurface(dsurface_t *ds, srfGeneric_t *gen, vec3_t pt)
1129 {
1130  // set bounding sphere
1131  SphereFromBounds(gen->bounds[0], gen->bounds[1], gen->origin, &gen->radius);
1132 
1133  // take the plane normal from the lightmap vector and classify it
1134  gen->plane.normal[0] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[2][0]);
1135  gen->plane.normal[1] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[2][1]);
1136  gen->plane.normal[2] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[2][2]);
1137  gen->plane.dist = DotProduct(pt, gen->plane.normal);
1138  SetPlaneSignbits(&gen->plane);
1139  gen->plane.type = PlaneTypeForNormal(gen->plane.normal);
1140 }
1141 
1149 static void ParseFace(dsurface_t *ds, drawVert_t *verts, bspSurface_t *surf, int *indexes)
1150 {
1151  int i, j;
1152  srfSurfaceFace_t *cv;
1153  srfTriangle_t *tri;
1154  int numVerts, numTriangles;
1155 
1156  // get lightmap
1157  if (r_vertexLighting->integer || !r_precomputedLighting->integer)
1158  {
1159  surf->lightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
1160  }
1161  else
1162  {
1163  surf->lightmapNum = LittleLong(ds->lightmapNum);
1164  }
1165 
1166  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping && surf->lightmapNum >= 2)
1167  {
1168  surf->lightmapNum /= 2;
1169  }*/
1170 
1171  /*
1172  if(surf->lightmapNum >= tr.lightmaps.currentElements)
1173  {
1174  Ren_Drop( "Bad lightmap number %i in face surface", surf->lightmapNum);
1175  }
1176  */
1177 
1178  // get fog volume
1179  surf->fogIndex = LittleLong(ds->fogNum) + 1;
1180 
1181  // get shader value
1182  surf->shader = ShaderForShaderNum(ds->shaderNum);
1183  if (r_singleShader->integer && !surf->shader->isSky)
1184  {
1185  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1186  }
1187 
1188  numVerts = LittleLong(ds->numVerts);
1189  /*
1190  if(numVerts > MAX_FACE_POINTS)
1191  {
1192  Ren_Warning( "WARNING: MAX_FACE_POINTS exceeded: %i\n", numVerts);
1193  numVerts = MAX_FACE_POINTS;
1194  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1195  }
1196  */
1197  numTriangles = LittleLong(ds->numIndexes) / 3;
1198 
1199  cv = (srfSurfaceFace_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*cv), h_low);
1200  cv->surfaceType = SF_FACE;
1201 
1202  cv->numTriangles = numTriangles;
1203  cv->triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numTriangles * sizeof(cv->triangles[0]), h_low);
1204 
1205  cv->numVerts = numVerts;
1206  cv->verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(cv->verts[0]), h_low);
1207 
1208  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *) cv;
1209 
1210  // copy vertexes
1211  ClearBounds(cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1212  verts += LittleLong(ds->firstVert);
1213  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1214  {
1215  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1216  {
1217  cv->verts[i].xyz[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].xyz[j]);
1218  cv->verts[i].normal[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].normal[j]);
1219  }
1220  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[i].xyz, cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1221  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
1222  {
1223  cv->verts[i].st[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].st[j]);
1224  cv->verts[i].lightmap[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].lightmap[j]);
1225  }
1226 
1227  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
1228  {
1229  cv->verts[i].lightColor[j] = verts[i].color[j] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
1230  }
1231  R_ColorShiftLightingFloats(cv->verts[i].lightColor, cv->verts[i].lightColor);
1232  }
1233 
1234  // copy triangles
1235  indexes += LittleLong(ds->firstIndex);
1236  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1237  {
1238  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1239  {
1240  tri->indexes[j] = LittleLong(indexes[i * 3 + j]);
1241 
1242  if (tri->indexes[j] < 0 || tri->indexes[j] >= numVerts)
1243  {
1244  Ren_Drop("Bad index in face surface");
1245  }
1246  }
1247  }
1248 
1249  //R_CalcSurfaceTrianglePlanes(numTriangles, cv->triangles, cv->verts);
1250 
1251  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *) cv;
1252 
1253  // calc tangent spaces
1254 #if 0 // example: oasis wall
1255  {
1256  float *v;
1257  const float *v0, *v1, *v2;
1258  const float *t0, *t1, *t2;
1259  vec3_t tangent;
1260  vec3_t binormal;
1261  vec3_t normal;
1262 
1263  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1264  {
1265  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1266  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].binormal);
1267  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].normal);
1268  }
1269 
1270  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1271  {
1272  v0 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz;
1273  v1 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz;
1274  v2 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz;
1275 
1276  t0 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]].st;
1277  t1 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]].st;
1278  t2 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]].st;
1279 
1280  R_CalcTangentSpace(tangent, binormal, normal, v0, v1, v2, t0, t1, t2);
1281 
1282  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1283  {
1284  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].tangent;
1285  VectorAdd(v, tangent, v);
1286  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].binormal;
1287  VectorAdd(v, binormal, v);
1288  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].normal;
1289  VectorAdd(v, normal, v);
1290  }
1291  }
1292 
1293  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1294  {
1295  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1296  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].binormal);
1297  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].normal);
1298  }
1299  }
1300 #else
1301  {
1302  srfVert_t *dv[3];
1303 
1304  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1305  {
1306  dv[0] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]];
1307  dv[1] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]];
1308  dv[2] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]];
1309 
1310  R_CalcTangentVectors(dv);
1311  }
1312  }
1313 #endif
1314 
1315  // finish surface
1316  FinishGenericSurface(ds, (srfGeneric_t *) cv, cv->verts[0].xyz);
1317 }
1318 
1325 static void ParseMesh(dsurface_t *ds, drawVert_t *verts, bspSurface_t *surf)
1326 {
1327  srfGridMesh_t *grid;
1328  int i, j;
1329  int width, height, numPoints;
1330  static srfVert_t points[MAX_PATCH_SIZE * MAX_PATCH_SIZE];
1331  vec3_t bounds[2];
1332  vec3_t tmpVec;
1333  static surfaceType_t skipData = SF_SKIP;
1334 
1335  // get lightmap
1336  if (r_vertexLighting->integer || !r_precomputedLighting->integer)
1337  {
1338  surf->lightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
1339  }
1340  else
1341  {
1342  surf->lightmapNum = LittleLong(ds->lightmapNum);
1343  }
1344 
1345  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping && surf->lightmapNum >= 2)
1346  {
1347  surf->lightmapNum /= 2;
1348  }*/
1349 
1350  // get fog volume
1351  surf->fogIndex = LittleLong(ds->fogNum) + 1;
1352 
1353  // get shader value
1354  surf->shader = ShaderForShaderNum(ds->shaderNum);
1355  if (r_singleShader->integer && !surf->shader->isSky)
1356  {
1357  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1358  }
1359 
1360  // we may have a nodraw surface, because they might still need to
1361  // be around for movement clipping
1362  if (s_worldData.shaders[LittleLong(ds->shaderNum)].surfaceFlags & SURF_NODRAW)
1363  {
1364  surf->data = &skipData;
1365  return;
1366  }
1367 
1368  width = LittleLong(ds->patchWidth);
1369  height = LittleLong(ds->patchHeight);
1370 
1371  if (width < 0 || width > MAX_PATCH_SIZE || height < 0 || height > MAX_PATCH_SIZE)
1372  {
1373  Ren_Drop("ParseMesh: bad size");
1374  }
1375 
1376  verts += LittleLong(ds->firstVert);
1377  numPoints = width * height;
1378  for (i = 0; i < numPoints; i++)
1379  {
1380  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1381  {
1382  points[i].xyz[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].xyz[j]);
1383  points[i].normal[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].normal[j]);
1384  }
1385 
1386  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
1387  {
1388  points[i].st[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].st[j]);
1389  points[i].lightmap[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].lightmap[j]);
1390  }
1391 
1392  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
1393  {
1394  points[i].lightColor[j] = verts[i].color[j] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
1395  }
1396  R_ColorShiftLightingFloats(points[i].lightColor, points[i].lightColor);
1397  }
1398 
1399  // pre-tesseleate
1400  grid = R_SubdividePatchToGrid(width, height, points);
1401  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *) grid;
1402 
1403  // copy the level of detail origin, which is the center
1404  // of the group of all curves that must subdivide the same
1405  // to avoid cracking
1406  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
1407  {
1408  bounds[0][i] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[0][i]);
1409  bounds[1][i] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[1][i]);
1410  }
1411  VectorAdd(bounds[0], bounds[1], bounds[1]);
1412  VectorScale(bounds[1], 0.5f, grid->lodOrigin);
1413  VectorSubtract(bounds[0], grid->lodOrigin, tmpVec);
1414  grid->lodRadius = VectorLength(tmpVec);
1415 
1416  // finish surface
1417  FinishGenericSurface(ds, (srfGeneric_t *) grid, grid->verts[0].xyz);
1418 }
1419 
1427 static void ParseTriSurf(dsurface_t *ds, drawVert_t *verts, bspSurface_t *surf, int *indexes)
1428 {
1429  srfTriangles_t *cv;
1430  srfTriangle_t *tri;
1431  int i, j;
1432  int numVerts, numTriangles;
1433  static surfaceType_t skipData = SF_SKIP;
1434 
1435  // get lightmap
1436  if (r_vertexLighting->integer || !r_precomputedLighting->integer)
1437  {
1438  surf->lightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
1439  }
1440  else
1441  {
1442  surf->lightmapNum = LittleLong(ds->lightmapNum);
1443  }
1444 
1445  /*if (tr.worldDeluxeMapping && surf->lightmapNum >= 2)
1446  {
1447  surf->lightmapNum /= 2;
1448  }*/
1449 
1450  // get fog volume
1451  surf->fogIndex = LittleLong(ds->fogNum) + 1;
1452 
1453  // get shader
1454  surf->shader = ShaderForShaderNum(ds->shaderNum);
1455  if (r_singleShader->integer && !surf->shader->isSky)
1456  {
1457  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1458  }
1459 
1460  // we may have a nodraw surface, because they might still need to
1461  // be around for movement clipping
1462  if (s_worldData.shaders[LittleLong(ds->shaderNum)].surfaceFlags & SURF_NODRAW)
1463  {
1464  surf->data = &skipData;
1465  return;
1466  }
1467 
1468  numVerts = LittleLong(ds->numVerts);
1469  numTriangles = LittleLong(ds->numIndexes) / 3;
1470 
1471  cv = (srfTriangles_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*cv), h_low);
1472  cv->surfaceType = SF_TRIANGLES;
1473 
1474  cv->numTriangles = numTriangles;
1475  cv->triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numTriangles * sizeof(cv->triangles[0]), h_low);
1476 
1477  cv->numVerts = numVerts;
1478  cv->verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(cv->verts[0]), h_low);
1479 
1480  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *) cv;
1481 
1482  // copy vertexes
1483  verts += LittleLong(ds->firstVert);
1484  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1485  {
1486  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1487  {
1488  cv->verts[i].xyz[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].xyz[j]);
1489  cv->verts[i].normal[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].normal[j]);
1490  }
1491 
1492  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
1493  {
1494  cv->verts[i].st[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].st[j]);
1495  cv->verts[i].lightmap[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].lightmap[j]);
1496  }
1497 
1498  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
1499  {
1500  cv->verts[i].lightColor[j] = verts[i].color[j] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
1501  }
1502  R_ColorShiftLightingFloats(cv->verts[i].lightColor, cv->verts[i].lightColor);
1503  }
1504 
1505  // copy triangles
1506  indexes += LittleLong(ds->firstIndex);
1507  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1508  {
1509  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1510  {
1511  tri->indexes[j] = LittleLong(indexes[i * 3 + j]);
1512 
1513  if (tri->indexes[j] < 0 || tri->indexes[j] >= numVerts)
1514  {
1515  Ren_Drop("Bad index in face surface");
1516  }
1517  }
1518  }
1519 
1520  // calc bounding box
1521  // HACK: don't loop only through the vertices because they can contain bad data with .lwo models ...
1522  ClearBounds(cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1523  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1524  {
1525  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1526  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1527  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, cv->bounds[0], cv->bounds[1]);
1528  }
1529 
1530  //R_CalcSurfaceTrianglePlanes(numTriangles, cv->triangles, cv->verts);
1531 
1532  // calc tangent spaces
1533 #if 0
1534  {
1535  float *v;
1536  const float *v0, *v1, *v2;
1537  const float *t0, *t1, *t2;
1538  vec3_t tangent;
1539  vec3_t binormal;
1540  vec3_t normal;
1541 
1542  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1543  {
1544  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1545  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].binormal);
1546  VectorClear(cv->verts[i].normal);
1547  }
1548 
1549  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1550  {
1551  v0 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz;
1552  v1 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz;
1553  v2 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz;
1554 
1555  t0 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]].st;
1556  t1 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]].st;
1557  t2 = cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]].st;
1558 
1559 #if 1
1560  R_CalcTangentSpace(tangent, binormal, normal, v0, v1, v2, t0, t1, t2);
1561 #else
1562  R_CalcNormalForTriangle(normal, v0, v1, v2);
1563  R_CalcTangentsForTriangle2(tangent, binormal, v0, v1, v2, t0, t1, t2);
1564 #endif
1565 
1566  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1567  {
1568  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].tangent;
1569  VectorAdd(v, tangent, v);
1570  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].binormal;
1571  VectorAdd(v, binormal, v);
1572  v = cv->verts[tri->indexes[j]].normal;
1573  VectorAdd(v, normal, v);
1574  }
1575  }
1576 
1577  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1578  {
1579  float dot;
1580 
1581  //VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1582  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].binormal);
1583  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].normal);
1584 
1585  // Gram-Schmidt orthogonalize
1586  dot = DotProduct(cv->verts[i].normal, cv->verts[i].tangent);
1587  VectorMA(cv->verts[i].tangent, -dot, cv->verts[i].normal, cv->verts[i].tangent);
1588  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1589 
1590  //dot = DotProduct(cv->verts[i].normal, cv->verts[i].tangent);
1591  //VectorMA(cv->verts[i].tangent, -dot, cv->verts[i].normal, cv->verts[i].tangent);
1592  //VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].tangent);
1593  }
1594  }
1595 #else
1596  {
1597  srfVert_t *dv[3];
1598 
1599  for (i = 0, tri = cv->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1600  {
1601  dv[0] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[0]];
1602  dv[1] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[1]];
1603  dv[2] = &cv->verts[tri->indexes[2]];
1604 
1605  R_CalcTangentVectors(dv);
1606  }
1607  }
1608 #endif
1609 
1610  // do another extra smoothing for normals to avoid flat shading
1611  if (r_smoothNormals->integer & FLAGS_SMOOTH_TRISURF)
1612  {
1613  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1614  {
1615  for (j = 0; j < numVerts; j++)
1616  {
1617  if (i == j)
1618  {
1619  continue;
1620  }
1621 
1622  if (R_CompareVert(&cv->verts[i], &cv->verts[j], qfalse))
1623  {
1624  VectorAdd(cv->verts[i].normal, cv->verts[j].normal, cv->verts[i].normal);
1625  }
1626  }
1627 
1628  VectorNormalize(cv->verts[i].normal);
1629  }
1630  }
1631 
1632  // finish surface
1633  FinishGenericSurface(ds, (srfGeneric_t *) cv, cv->verts[0].xyz);
1634 }
1635 
1643 static void ParseFoliage(dsurface_t *ds, drawVert_t *verts, bspSurface_t *surf, int *indexes)
1644 {
1645  srfFoliage_t *foliage;
1646  srfTriangle_t *tri;
1647  int i, j, numVerts, numInstances, numTriangles;
1648  vec3_t bounds[2], boundsTranslated[2];
1649  float foliageHeightScale;
1650 
1651  foliageHeightScale = Com_Clamp(0.1f, 2.0f, r_drawFoliage->value);
1652 
1653  surf->fogIndex = LittleLong(ds->fogNum) + 1;
1654  surf->shader = ShaderForShaderNum(ds->shaderNum);
1655  if (r_singleShader->integer && !surf->shader->isSky)
1656  {
1657  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1658  }
1659  surf->lightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_BY_VERTEX;
1660 
1661  // foliage surfaces have their actual vert count in patchHeight
1662  // and the instance count in patchWidth
1663  // the instances are just additional drawverts
1664 
1665  // get counts
1666  numVerts = LittleLong(ds->patchHeight);
1667  numInstances = LittleLong(ds->patchWidth);
1668  numTriangles = LittleLong(ds->numIndexes) / 3;
1669 
1670  // get memory
1671  foliage = (srfFoliage_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*foliage), h_low);
1672  // set up surface
1673  foliage->surfaceType = SF_FOLIAGE;
1674  // allocate space for tris
1675  foliage->numTriangles = numTriangles;
1676  foliage->triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numTriangles * sizeof(foliage->triangles[0]), h_low);
1677  // allocate space for verts
1678  foliage->numVerts = numVerts;
1679  foliage->verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(foliage->verts[0]), h_low);
1680  // allocate space for instances
1681  foliage->numInstances = numInstances;
1682  foliage->instances = (foliageInstance_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numInstances * sizeof(foliage->instances[0]), h_low);
1683 
1684  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *)foliage;
1685 
1686  // copy vertexes
1687  ClearBounds(bounds[0], bounds[1]);
1688  verts += LittleLong(ds->firstVert);
1689  for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++)
1690  {
1691  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1692  {
1693  foliage->verts[i].xyz[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].xyz[j]);
1694  foliage->verts[i].normal[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].normal[j]);
1695  }
1696  foliage->verts[i].xyz[2] *= foliageHeightScale;
1697 
1698  // finish
1699  AddPointToBounds(foliage->verts[i].xyz, bounds[0], bounds[1]);
1700 
1701  // copy texture coordinates
1702  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
1703  {
1704  foliage->verts[i].st[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].st[j]);
1705  foliage->verts[i].lightmap[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].lightmap[j]);
1706  }
1707  }
1708 
1709  // copy indexes
1710  indexes += LittleLong(ds->firstIndex);
1711  for (i = 0, tri = foliage->triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
1712  {
1713  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1714  {
1715  tri->indexes[j] = LittleLong(indexes[i * 3 + j]);
1716  if (tri->indexes[j] < 0 || tri->indexes[j] >= numVerts)
1717  {
1718  Ren_Drop("Bad index in triangle surface");
1719  }
1720  }
1721  }
1722 
1723  // copy instances
1724  ClearBounds(foliage->bounds[0], foliage->bounds[1]);
1725  verts += numVerts;
1726  for (i = 0; i < numInstances; i++)
1727  {
1728  // copy origin
1729  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
1730  {
1731  foliage->instances[i].origin[j] = LittleFloat(verts[i].xyz[j]);
1732  }
1733  VectorAdd(bounds[0], foliage->instances[i].origin, boundsTranslated[0]);
1734  VectorAdd(bounds[1], foliage->instances[i].origin, boundsTranslated[1]);
1735  AddPointToBounds(boundsTranslated[0], foliage->bounds[0], foliage->bounds[1]);
1736  AddPointToBounds(boundsTranslated[1], foliage->bounds[0], foliage->bounds[1]);
1737 
1738  // copy color
1739  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(verts[i].color, foliage->instances[i].color);
1740  }
1741 
1742  //R_CalcSurfaceTrianglePlanes(numTriangles, foliage->triangles, foliage->verts);
1743 
1744  // finish surface
1745  FinishGenericSurface(ds, (srfGeneric_t *)foliage, foliage->verts[0].xyz);
1746 }
1747 
1755 static void ParseFlare(dsurface_t *ds, drawVert_t *verts, bspSurface_t *surf, int *indexes)
1756 {
1757  srfFlare_t *flare;
1758  int i;
1759 
1760  // set lightmap
1761  surf->lightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_BY_VERTEX;
1762 
1763  // get fog volume
1764  surf->fogIndex = LittleLong(ds->fogNum) + 1;
1765 
1766  // get shader
1767  surf->shader = ShaderForShaderNum(ds->shaderNum);
1768  if (r_singleShader->integer && !surf->shader->isSky)
1769  {
1770  surf->shader = tr.defaultShader;
1771  }
1772 
1773  flare = (srfFlare_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*flare), h_low);
1774  flare->surfaceType = SF_FLARE;
1775 
1776  surf->data = (surfaceType_t *) flare;
1777 
1778  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
1779  {
1780  flare->origin[i] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapOrigin[i]);
1781  flare->color[i] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[0][i]);
1782  flare->normal[i] = LittleFloat(ds->lightmapVecs[2][i]);
1783  }
1784 }
1785 
1792 int R_MergedWidthPoints(srfGridMesh_t *grid, int offset)
1793 {
1794  int i, j;
1795 
1796  for (i = 1; i < grid->width - 1; i++)
1797  {
1798  for (j = i + 1; j < grid->width - 1; j++)
1799  {
1800  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[i + offset].xyz[0] - grid->verts[j + offset].xyz[0]) > .1f)
1801  {
1802  continue;
1803  }
1804  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[i + offset].xyz[1] - grid->verts[j + offset].xyz[1]) > .1f)
1805  {
1806  continue;
1807  }
1808  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[i + offset].xyz[2] - grid->verts[j + offset].xyz[2]) > .1f)
1809  {
1810  continue;
1811  }
1812  return qtrue;
1813  }
1814  }
1815  return qfalse;
1816 }
1817 
1824 int R_MergedHeightPoints(srfGridMesh_t *grid, int offset)
1825 {
1826  int i, j;
1827 
1828  for (i = 1; i < grid->height - 1; i++)
1829  {
1830  for (j = i + 1; j < grid->height - 1; j++)
1831  {
1832  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[grid->width * i + offset].xyz[0] - grid->verts[grid->width * j + offset].xyz[0]) > .1f)
1833  {
1834  continue;
1835  }
1836  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[grid->width * i + offset].xyz[1] - grid->verts[grid->width * j + offset].xyz[1]) > .1f)
1837  {
1838  continue;
1839  }
1840  if (Q_fabs(grid->verts[grid->width * i + offset].xyz[2] - grid->verts[grid->width * j + offset].xyz[2]) > .1f)
1841  {
1842  continue;
1843  }
1844  return qtrue;
1845  }
1846  }
1847  return qfalse;
1848 }
1849 
1859 static void R_FixSharedVertexLodError_r(int start, srfGridMesh_t *grid1)
1860 {
1861  int j, k, l, m, n, offset1, offset2, touch;
1862  srfGridMesh_t *grid2;
1863 
1864  for (j = start; j < s_worldData.numSurfaces; j++)
1865  {
1866  grid2 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[j].data;
1867  // if this surface is not a grid
1868  if (grid2->surfaceType != SF_GRID)
1869  {
1870  continue;
1871  }
1872  // if the LOD errors are already fixed for this patch
1873  if (grid2->lodFixed == 2)
1874  {
1875  continue;
1876  }
1877  // grids in the same LOD group should have the exact same lod radius
1878  if (grid1->lodRadius != grid2->lodRadius)
1879  {
1880  continue;
1881  }
1882  // grids in the same LOD group should have the exact same lod origin
1883  if (grid1->lodOrigin[0] != grid2->lodOrigin[0])
1884  {
1885  continue;
1886  }
1887  if (grid1->lodOrigin[1] != grid2->lodOrigin[1])
1888  {
1889  continue;
1890  }
1891  if (grid1->lodOrigin[2] != grid2->lodOrigin[2])
1892  {
1893  continue;
1894  }
1895 
1896  touch = qfalse;
1897  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
1898  {
1899  if (n)
1900  {
1901  offset1 = (grid1->height - 1) * grid1->width;
1902  }
1903  else
1904  {
1905  offset1 = 0;
1906  }
1907  if (R_MergedWidthPoints(grid1, offset1))
1908  {
1909  continue;
1910  }
1911  for (k = 1; k < grid1->width - 1; k++)
1912  {
1913  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
1914  {
1915  if (m)
1916  {
1917  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
1918  }
1919  else
1920  {
1921  offset2 = 0;
1922  }
1923  if (R_MergedWidthPoints(grid2, offset2))
1924  {
1925  continue;
1926  }
1927  for (l = 1; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
1928  {
1929  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[0] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[0]) > .1f)
1930  {
1931  continue;
1932  }
1933  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[1] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[1]) > .1f)
1934  {
1935  continue;
1936  }
1937  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[2] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[2]) > .1f)
1938  {
1939  continue;
1940  }
1941  // ok the points are equal and should have the same lod error
1942  grid2->widthLodError[l] = grid1->widthLodError[k];
1943  touch = qtrue;
1944  }
1945  }
1946  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
1947  {
1948  if (m)
1949  {
1950  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
1951  }
1952  else
1953  {
1954  offset2 = 0;
1955  }
1956  if (R_MergedHeightPoints(grid2, offset2))
1957  {
1958  continue;
1959  }
1960  for (l = 1; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
1961  {
1962  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[0] - grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[0]) > .1f)
1963  {
1964  continue;
1965  }
1966  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[1] - grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[1]) > .1f)
1967  {
1968  continue;
1969  }
1970  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz[2] - grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[2]) > .1f)
1971  {
1972  continue;
1973  }
1974  // ok the points are equal and should have the same lod error
1975  grid2->heightLodError[l] = grid1->widthLodError[k];
1976  touch = qtrue;
1977  }
1978  }
1979  }
1980  }
1981  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
1982  {
1983  if (n)
1984  {
1985  offset1 = grid1->width - 1;
1986  }
1987  else
1988  {
1989  offset1 = 0;
1990  }
1991  if (R_MergedHeightPoints(grid1, offset1))
1992  {
1993  continue;
1994  }
1995  for (k = 1; k < grid1->height - 1; k++)
1996  {
1997  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
1998  {
1999  if (m)
2000  {
2001  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
2002  }
2003  else
2004  {
2005  offset2 = 0;
2006  }
2007  if (R_MergedWidthPoints(grid2, offset2))
2008  {
2009  continue;
2010  }
2011  for (l = 1; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
2012  {
2013  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[0] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[0]) > .1f)
2014  {
2015  continue;
2016  }
2017  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[1] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[1]) > .1f)
2018  {
2019  continue;
2020  }
2021  if (Q_fabs(grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[2] - grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz[2]) > .1f)
2022  {
2023  continue;
2024  }
2025  // ok the points are equal and should have the same lod error
2026  grid2->widthLodError[l] = grid1->heightLodError[k];
2027  touch = qtrue;
2028  }
2029  }
2030  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2031  {
2032  if (m)
2033  {
2034  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
2035  }
2036  else
2037  {
2038  offset2 = 0;
2039  }
2040  if (R_MergedHeightPoints(grid2, offset2))
2041  {
2042  continue;
2043  }
2044  for (l = 1; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
2045  {
2046  if (Q_fabs
2047  (grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[0] -
2048  grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[0]) > .1f)
2049  {
2050  continue;
2051  }
2052  if (Q_fabs
2053  (grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[1] -
2054  grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[1]) > .1f)
2055  {
2056  continue;
2057  }
2058  if (Q_fabs
2059  (grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz[2] -
2060  grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz[2]) > .1f)
2061  {
2062  continue;
2063  }
2064  // ok the points are equal and should have the same lod error
2065  grid2->heightLodError[l] = grid1->heightLodError[k];
2066  touch = qtrue;
2067  }
2068  }
2069  }
2070  }
2071  if (touch)
2072  {
2073  grid2->lodFixed = 2;
2074  R_FixSharedVertexLodError_r(start, grid2);
2075  //NOTE: this would be correct but makes things really slow
2076  //grid2->lodFixed = 1;
2077  }
2078  }
2079 }
2080 
2085 static void R_FixSharedVertexLodError(void)
2086 {
2087  int i;
2088  srfGridMesh_t *grid1;
2089 
2090  for (i = 0; i < s_worldData.numSurfaces; i++)
2091  {
2092  grid1 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[i].data;
2093  // if this surface is not a grid
2094  if (grid1->surfaceType != SF_GRID)
2095  {
2096  continue;
2097  }
2098 
2099  if (grid1->lodFixed)
2100  {
2101  continue;
2102  }
2103 
2104  grid1->lodFixed = 2;
2105  // recursively fix other patches in the same LOD group
2106  R_FixSharedVertexLodError_r(i + 1, grid1);
2107  }
2108 }
2109 
2116 static int R_StitchPatches(int grid1num, int grid2num)
2117 {
2118  float *v1, *v2;
2119  int k, l, m, n, offset1, offset2, row, column;
2120  srfGridMesh_t *grid1 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[grid1num].data;
2121  srfGridMesh_t *grid2 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data;
2122 
2123  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
2124  {
2125 
2126  if (n)
2127  {
2128  offset1 = (grid1->height - 1) * grid1->width;
2129  }
2130  else
2131  {
2132  offset1 = 0;
2133  }
2134  if (R_MergedWidthPoints(grid1, offset1))
2135  {
2136  continue;
2137  }
2138  for (k = 0; k < grid1->width - 2; k += 2)
2139  {
2140  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2141  {
2142  if (grid2->width >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2143  {
2144  break;
2145  }
2146  if (m)
2147  {
2148  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
2149  }
2150  else
2151  {
2152  offset2 = 0;
2153  }
2154  for (l = 0; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
2155  {
2156  v1 = grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz;
2157  v2 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2158  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2159  {
2160  continue;
2161  }
2162  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2163  {
2164  continue;
2165  }
2166  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2167  {
2168  continue;
2169  }
2170 
2171  v1 = grid1->verts[k + 2 + offset1].xyz;
2172  v2 = grid2->verts[l + 1 + offset2].xyz;
2173  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2174  {
2175  continue;
2176  }
2177  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2178  {
2179  continue;
2180  }
2181  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2182  {
2183  continue;
2184  }
2185 
2186  v1 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2187  v2 = grid2->verts[l + 1 + offset2].xyz;
2188  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2189  {
2190  continue;
2191  }
2192 
2193  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2194  // insert column into grid2 right after after column l
2195  if (m)
2196  {
2197  row = grid2->height - 1;
2198  }
2199  else
2200  {
2201  row = 0;
2202  }
2203  grid2 = R_GridInsertColumn(grid2, l + 1, row, grid1->verts[k + 1 + offset1].xyz, grid1->widthLodError[k + 1]);
2204  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2205  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2206  return qtrue;
2207  }
2208  }
2209  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2210  {
2211  if (grid2->height >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2212  {
2213  break;
2214  }
2215  if (m)
2216  {
2217  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
2218  }
2219  else
2220  {
2221  offset2 = 0;
2222  }
2223  for (l = 0; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
2224  {
2225  v1 = grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz;
2226  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2227  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2228  {
2229  continue;
2230  }
2231  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2232  {
2233  continue;
2234  }
2235  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2236  {
2237  continue;
2238  }
2239 
2240  v1 = grid1->verts[k + 2 + offset1].xyz;
2241  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2242  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2243  {
2244  continue;
2245  }
2246  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2247  {
2248  continue;
2249  }
2250  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2251  {
2252  continue;
2253  }
2254 
2255  v1 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2256  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2257  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2258  {
2259  continue;
2260  }
2261 
2262  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2263  // insert row into grid2 right after after row l
2264  if (m)
2265  {
2266  column = grid2->width - 1;
2267  }
2268  else
2269  {
2270  column = 0;
2271  }
2272  grid2 = R_GridInsertRow(grid2, l + 1, column, grid1->verts[k + 1 + offset1].xyz, grid1->widthLodError[k + 1]);
2273  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2274  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2275  return qtrue;
2276  }
2277  }
2278  }
2279  }
2280  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
2281  {
2282  if (n)
2283  {
2284  offset1 = grid1->width - 1;
2285  }
2286  else
2287  {
2288  offset1 = 0;
2289  }
2290  if (R_MergedHeightPoints(grid1, offset1))
2291  {
2292  continue;
2293  }
2294  for (k = 0; k < grid1->height - 2; k += 2)
2295  {
2296  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2297  {
2298  if (grid2->width >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2299  {
2300  break;
2301  }
2302  if (m)
2303  {
2304  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
2305  }
2306  else
2307  {
2308  offset2 = 0;
2309  }
2310  for (l = 0; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
2311  {
2312  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz;
2313  v2 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2314  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2315  {
2316  continue;
2317  }
2318  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2319  {
2320  continue;
2321  }
2322  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2323  {
2324  continue;
2325  }
2326 
2327  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k + 2) + offset1].xyz;
2328  v2 = grid2->verts[l + 1 + offset2].xyz;
2329  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2330  {
2331  continue;
2332  }
2333  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2334  {
2335  continue;
2336  }
2337  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2338  {
2339  continue;
2340  }
2341 
2342  v1 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2343  v2 = grid2->verts[(l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2344  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2345  {
2346  continue;
2347  }
2348 
2349  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2350  // insert column into grid2 right after after column l
2351  if (m)
2352  {
2353  row = grid2->height - 1;
2354  }
2355  else
2356  {
2357  row = 0;
2358  }
2359  grid2 = R_GridInsertColumn(grid2, l + 1, row,
2360  grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k + 1) + offset1].xyz, grid1->heightLodError[k + 1]);
2361  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2362  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2363  return qtrue;
2364  }
2365  }
2366  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2367  {
2368  if (grid2->height >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2369  {
2370  break;
2371  }
2372  if (m)
2373  {
2374  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
2375  }
2376  else
2377  {
2378  offset2 = 0;
2379  }
2380  for (l = 0; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
2381  {
2382  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz;
2383  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2384  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2385  {
2386  continue;
2387  }
2388  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2389  {
2390  continue;
2391  }
2392  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2393  {
2394  continue;
2395  }
2396 
2397  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k + 2) + offset1].xyz;
2398  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2399  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2400  {
2401  continue;
2402  }
2403  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2404  {
2405  continue;
2406  }
2407  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2408  {
2409  continue;
2410  }
2411 
2412  v1 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2413  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2414  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2415  {
2416  continue;
2417  }
2418 
2419  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2420  // insert row into grid2 right after after row l
2421  if (m)
2422  {
2423  column = grid2->width - 1;
2424  }
2425  else
2426  {
2427  column = 0;
2428  }
2429  grid2 = R_GridInsertRow(grid2, l + 1, column,
2430  grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k + 1) + offset1].xyz, grid1->heightLodError[k + 1]);
2431  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2432  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2433  return qtrue;
2434  }
2435  }
2436  }
2437  }
2438  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
2439  {
2440  if (n)
2441  {
2442  offset1 = (grid1->height - 1) * grid1->width;
2443  }
2444  else
2445  {
2446  offset1 = 0;
2447  }
2448  if (R_MergedWidthPoints(grid1, offset1))
2449  {
2450  continue;
2451  }
2452  for (k = grid1->width - 1; k > 1; k -= 2)
2453  {
2454  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2455  {
2456  if (!grid2 || grid2->width >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2457  {
2458  break;
2459  }
2460  if (m)
2461  {
2462  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
2463  }
2464  else
2465  {
2466  offset2 = 0;
2467  }
2468  for (l = 0; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
2469  {
2470  v1 = grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz;
2471  v2 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2472  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2473  {
2474  continue;
2475  }
2476  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2477  {
2478  continue;
2479  }
2480  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2481  {
2482  continue;
2483  }
2484 
2485  v1 = grid1->verts[k - 2 + offset1].xyz;
2486  v2 = grid2->verts[l + 1 + offset2].xyz;
2487  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2488  {
2489  continue;
2490  }
2491  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2492  {
2493  continue;
2494  }
2495  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2496  {
2497  continue;
2498  }
2499 
2500  v1 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2501  v2 = grid2->verts[(l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2502  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2503  {
2504  continue;
2505  }
2506 
2507  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2508  // insert column into grid2 right after after column l
2509  if (m)
2510  {
2511  row = grid2->height - 1;
2512  }
2513  else
2514  {
2515  row = 0;
2516  }
2517  grid2 = R_GridInsertColumn(grid2, l + 1, row, grid1->verts[k - 1 + offset1].xyz, grid1->widthLodError[k + 1]);
2518  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2519  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2520  return qtrue;
2521  }
2522  }
2523  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2524  {
2525  if (!grid2 || grid2->height >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2526  {
2527  break;
2528  }
2529  if (m)
2530  {
2531  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
2532  }
2533  else
2534  {
2535  offset2 = 0;
2536  }
2537  for (l = 0; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
2538  {
2539  v1 = grid1->verts[k + offset1].xyz;
2540  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2541  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2542  {
2543  continue;
2544  }
2545  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2546  {
2547  continue;
2548  }
2549  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2550  {
2551  continue;
2552  }
2553 
2554  v1 = grid1->verts[k - 2 + offset1].xyz;
2555  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2556  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2557  {
2558  continue;
2559  }
2560  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2561  {
2562  continue;
2563  }
2564  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2565  {
2566  continue;
2567  }
2568 
2569  v1 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2570  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2571  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2572  {
2573  continue;
2574  }
2575 
2576  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2577  // insert row into grid2 right after after row l
2578  if (m)
2579  {
2580  column = grid2->width - 1;
2581  }
2582  else
2583  {
2584  column = 0;
2585  }
2586  grid2 = R_GridInsertRow(grid2, l + 1, column, grid1->verts[k - 1 + offset1].xyz, grid1->widthLodError[k + 1]);
2587  if (!grid2)
2588  {
2589  break;
2590  }
2591  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2592  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2593  return qtrue;
2594  }
2595  }
2596  }
2597  }
2598  for (n = 0; n < 2; n++)
2599  {
2600  if (n)
2601  {
2602  offset1 = grid1->width - 1;
2603  }
2604  else
2605  {
2606  offset1 = 0;
2607  }
2608  if (R_MergedHeightPoints(grid1, offset1))
2609  {
2610  continue;
2611  }
2612  for (k = grid1->height - 1; k > 1; k -= 2)
2613  {
2614  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2615  {
2616  if (!grid2 || grid2->width >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2617  {
2618  break;
2619  }
2620  if (m)
2621  {
2622  offset2 = (grid2->height - 1) * grid2->width;
2623  }
2624  else
2625  {
2626  offset2 = 0;
2627  }
2628  for (l = 0; l < grid2->width - 1; l++)
2629  {
2630  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz;
2631  v2 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2632  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2633  {
2634  continue;
2635  }
2636  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2637  {
2638  continue;
2639  }
2640  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2641  {
2642  continue;
2643  }
2644 
2645  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k - 2) + offset1].xyz;
2646  v2 = grid2->verts[l + 1 + offset2].xyz;
2647  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2648  {
2649  continue;
2650  }
2651  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2652  {
2653  continue;
2654  }
2655  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2656  {
2657  continue;
2658  }
2659 
2660  v1 = grid2->verts[l + offset2].xyz;
2661  v2 = grid2->verts[(l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2662  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2663  {
2664  continue;
2665  }
2666 
2667  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2668  // insert column into grid2 right after after column l
2669  if (m)
2670  {
2671  row = grid2->height - 1;
2672  }
2673  else
2674  {
2675  row = 0;
2676  }
2677  grid2 = R_GridInsertColumn(grid2, l + 1, row,
2678  grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k - 1) + offset1].xyz, grid1->heightLodError[k + 1]);
2679  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2680  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2681  return qtrue;
2682  }
2683  }
2684  for (m = 0; m < 2; m++)
2685  {
2686  if (!grid2 || grid2->height >= MAX_GRID_SIZE)
2687  {
2688  break;
2689  }
2690  if (m)
2691  {
2692  offset2 = grid2->width - 1;
2693  }
2694  else
2695  {
2696  offset2 = 0;
2697  }
2698  for (l = 0; l < grid2->height - 1; l++)
2699  {
2700  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * k + offset1].xyz;
2701  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2702  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2703  {
2704  continue;
2705  }
2706  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2707  {
2708  continue;
2709  }
2710  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2711  {
2712  continue;
2713  }
2714 
2715  v1 = grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k - 2) + offset1].xyz;
2716  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2717  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) > .1f)
2718  {
2719  continue;
2720  }
2721  if (Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) > .1f)
2722  {
2723  continue;
2724  }
2725  if (Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) > .1f)
2726  {
2727  continue;
2728  }
2729 
2730  v1 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * l + offset2].xyz;
2731  v2 = grid2->verts[grid2->width * (l + 1) + offset2].xyz;
2732  if (Q_fabs(v1[0] - v2[0]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[1] - v2[1]) < .01f && Q_fabs(v1[2] - v2[2]) < .01f)
2733  {
2734  continue;
2735  }
2736 
2737  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "found highest LoD crack between two patches\n" );
2738  // insert row into grid2 right after after row l
2739  if (m)
2740  {
2741  column = grid2->width - 1;
2742  }
2743  else
2744  {
2745  column = 0;
2746  }
2747  grid2 = R_GridInsertRow(grid2, l + 1, column,
2748  grid1->verts[grid1->width * (k - 1) + offset1].xyz, grid1->heightLodError[k + 1]);
2749  grid2->lodStitched = qfalse;
2750  s_worldData.surfaces[grid2num].data = (surfaceType_t *)grid2;
2751  return qtrue;
2752  }
2753  }
2754  }
2755  }
2756  return qfalse;
2757 }
2758 
2771 static int R_TryStitchingPatch(int grid1num)
2772 {
2773  int j, numstitches = 0;
2774  srfGridMesh_t *grid1 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[grid1num].data;
2775  srfGridMesh_t *grid2;
2776 
2777  for (j = 0; j < s_worldData.numSurfaces; j++)
2778  {
2779  //
2780  grid2 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[j].data;
2781  // if this surface is not a grid
2782  if (grid2->surfaceType != SF_GRID)
2783  {
2784  continue;
2785  }
2786  // grids in the same LOD group should have the exact same lod radius
2787  if (grid1->lodRadius != grid2->lodRadius)
2788  {
2789  continue;
2790  }
2791  // grids in the same LOD group should have the exact same lod origin
2792  if (grid1->lodOrigin[0] != grid2->lodOrigin[0])
2793  {
2794  continue;
2795  }
2796  if (grid1->lodOrigin[1] != grid2->lodOrigin[1])
2797  {
2798  continue;
2799  }
2800  if (grid1->lodOrigin[2] != grid2->lodOrigin[2])
2801  {
2802  continue;
2803  }
2804  //
2805  while (R_StitchPatches(grid1num, j))
2806  {
2807  numstitches++;
2808  }
2809  }
2810  return numstitches;
2811 }
2812 
2816 static void R_StitchAllPatches(void)
2817 {
2818  int i, numstitches = 0;
2819  srfGridMesh_t *grid1;
2820  qboolean stitched;
2821 
2822  Ren_Developer("...stitching LoD cracks\n");
2823 
2824  do
2825  {
2826  stitched = qfalse;
2827  for (i = 0; i < s_worldData.numSurfaces; i++)
2828  {
2829  grid1 = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[i].data;
2830  // if this surface is not a grid
2831  if (grid1->surfaceType != SF_GRID)
2832  {
2833  continue;
2834  }
2835 
2836  if (grid1->lodStitched)
2837  {
2838  continue;
2839  }
2840 
2841  grid1->lodStitched = qtrue;
2842  stitched = qtrue;
2843 
2844  numstitches += R_TryStitchingPatch(i);
2845  }
2846  }
2847  while (stitched);
2848  Ren_Developer("stitched %d LoD cracks\n", numstitches);
2849 }
2850 
2854 static void R_MovePatchSurfacesToHunk(void)
2855 {
2856  int i;
2857  unsigned int size;
2858  srfGridMesh_t *grid, *hunkgrid;
2859 
2860  for (i = 0; i < s_worldData.numSurfaces; i++)
2861  {
2862  grid = (srfGridMesh_t *) s_worldData.surfaces[i].data;
2863 
2864  // if this surface is not a grid
2865  if (grid->surfaceType != SF_GRID)
2866  {
2867  continue;
2868  }
2869 
2870  size = sizeof(*grid);
2871  hunkgrid = (srfGridMesh_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(size, h_low);
2872  Com_Memcpy(hunkgrid, grid, size);
2873 
2874  hunkgrid->widthLodError = (float *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(grid->width * 4, h_low);
2875  Com_Memcpy(hunkgrid->widthLodError, grid->widthLodError, grid->width * 4);
2876 
2877  hunkgrid->heightLodError = (float *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(grid->height * 4, h_low);
2878  Com_Memcpy(hunkgrid->heightLodError, grid->heightLodError, grid->height * 4);
2879 
2880  hunkgrid->numTriangles = grid->numTriangles;
2881  hunkgrid->triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(grid->numTriangles * sizeof(srfTriangle_t), h_low);
2882  Com_Memcpy(hunkgrid->triangles, grid->triangles, grid->numTriangles * sizeof(srfTriangle_t));
2883 
2884  hunkgrid->numVerts = grid->numVerts;
2885  hunkgrid->verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(grid->numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t), h_low);
2886  Com_Memcpy(hunkgrid->verts, grid->verts, grid->numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t));
2887 
2888  R_FreeSurfaceGridMesh(grid);
2889 
2890  s_worldData.surfaces[i].data = (surfaceType_t *)hunkgrid;
2891  }
2892 }
2893 
2900 int BSPSurfaceCompare(const void *a, const void *b)
2901 {
2902  bspSurface_t *aa = *(bspSurface_t **) a;
2903  bspSurface_t *bb = *(bspSurface_t **) b;
2904 
2905  // shader first
2906  if (aa->shader < bb->shader)
2907  {
2908  return -1;
2909  }
2910  else if (aa->shader > bb->shader)
2911  {
2912  return 1;
2913  }
2914 
2915  // by lightmap
2916  if (aa->lightmapNum < bb->lightmapNum)
2917  {
2918  return -1;
2919  }
2920  else if (aa->lightmapNum > bb->lightmapNum)
2921  {
2922  return 1;
2923  }
2924 
2925  return 0;
2926 }
2927 
2933 static void CopyVert(const srfVert_t *in, srfVert_t *out)
2934 {
2935  int j;
2936 
2937  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
2938  {
2939  out->xyz[j] = in->xyz[j];
2940  out->tangent[j] = in->tangent[j];
2941  out->binormal[j] = in->binormal[j];
2942  out->normal[j] = in->normal[j];
2943  out->lightDirection[j] = in->lightDirection[j];
2944  }
2945 
2946  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
2947  {
2948  out->st[j] = in->st[j];
2949  out->lightmap[j] = in->lightmap[j];
2950  }
2951 
2952  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
2953  {
2954  out->paintColor[j] = in->paintColor[j];
2955  out->lightColor[j] = in->lightColor[j];
2956  }
2957 }
2958 
2959 #define EQUAL_EPSILON 0.001
2960 
2964 static void R_CreateClusters()
2965 {
2966  int i, j;
2967  bspNode_t *node;
2968  bspSurface_t *surface;
2969 #if defined(USE_BSP_CLUSTERSURFACE_MERGING)
2970  bspNode_t *parent;
2971  bspSurface_t **mark;
2972  int numClusters;
2973  bspCluster_t *cluster;
2974  growList_t clusterSurfaces;
2975  const byte *vis;
2976  int c;
2977  int surfaceNum;
2978  vec3_t mins, maxs;
2979 
2980  Ren_Print("...creating BSP clusters\n");
2981 
2982  if (s_worldData.vis)
2983  {
2984  // go through the leaves and count clusters
2985  numClusters = 0;
2986  for (i = 0, node = s_worldData.nodes; i < s_worldData.numnodes; i++, node++)
2987  {
2988  if (node->cluster >= numClusters)
2989  {
2990  numClusters = node->cluster;
2991  }
2992  }
2993  numClusters++;
2994 
2995  s_worldData.numClusters = numClusters;
2996  s_worldData.clusters = ri.Hunk_Alloc((numClusters + 1) * sizeof(*s_worldData.clusters), h_low); // + supercluster
2997 
2998  // reset surfaces' viewCount
2999  for (i = 0, surface = s_worldData.surfaces; i < s_worldData.numSurfaces; i++, surface++)
3000  {
3001  surface->viewCount = -1;
3002  }
3003 
3004  for (j = 0, node = s_worldData.nodes; j < s_worldData.numnodes; j++, node++)
3005  {
3006  node->visCounts[0] = -1;
3007  }
3008 
3009  for (i = 0; i < numClusters; i++)
3010  {
3011  cluster = &s_worldData.clusters[i];
3012 
3013  // mark leaves in cluster
3014  vis = s_worldData.vis + i * s_worldData.clusterBytes;
3015 
3016  for (j = 0, node = s_worldData.nodes; j < s_worldData.numnodes; j++, node++)
3017  {
3018  if (node->cluster < 0 || node->cluster >= numClusters)
3019  {
3020  continue;
3021  }
3022 
3023  // check general pvs
3024  if (!(vis[node->cluster >> 3] & (1 << (node->cluster & 7))))
3025  {
3026  continue;
3027  }
3028 
3029  parent = node;
3030  do
3031  {
3032  if (parent->visCounts[0] == i)
3033  {
3034  break;
3035  }
3036  parent->visCounts[0] = i;
3037  parent = parent->parent;
3038  }
3039  while (parent);
3040  }
3041 
3042 
3043  // add cluster surfaces
3044  Com_InitGrowList(&clusterSurfaces, 10000);
3045 
3046  ClearBounds(mins, maxs);
3047  for (j = 0, node = s_worldData.nodes; j < s_worldData.numnodes; j++, node++)
3048  {
3049  if (node->contents == CONTENTS_NODE)
3050  {
3051  continue;
3052  }
3053 
3054  if (node->visCounts[0] != i)
3055  {
3056  continue;
3057  }
3058 
3059  BoundsAdd(mins, maxs, node->mins, node->maxs);
3060 
3061  mark = node->markSurfaces;
3062  c = node->numMarkSurfaces;
3063  while (c--)
3064  {
3065  // the surface may have already been added if it
3066  // spans multiple leafs
3067  surface = *mark;
3068 
3069  surfaceNum = surface - s_worldData.surfaces;
3070 
3071  if ((surface->viewCount != i) && (surfaceNum < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces))
3072  {
3073  surface->viewCount = i;
3074  Com_AddToGrowList(&clusterSurfaces, surface);
3075  }
3076 
3077  mark++;
3078  }
3079  }
3080 
3081  cluster->origin[0] = (mins[0] + maxs[0]) / 2;
3082  cluster->origin[1] = (mins[1] + maxs[1]) / 2;
3083  cluster->origin[2] = (mins[2] + maxs[2]) / 2;
3084 
3085  //Ren_Print("cluster %i origin at (%i %i %i)\n", i, (int)cluster->origin[0], (int)cluster->origin[1], (int)cluster->origin[2]);
3086 
3087  // move cluster surfaces list to hunk
3088  cluster->numMarkSurfaces = clusterSurfaces.currentElements;
3089  cluster->markSurfaces = ri.Hunk_Alloc(cluster->numMarkSurfaces * sizeof(*cluster->markSurfaces), h_low);
3090 
3091  for (j = 0; j < cluster->numMarkSurfaces; j++)
3092  {
3093  cluster->markSurfaces[j] = (bspSurface_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&clusterSurfaces, j);
3094  }
3095 
3096  Com_DestroyGrowList(&clusterSurfaces);
3097 
3098  //Ren_Print("cluster %i contains %i bsp surfaces\n", i, cluster->numMarkSurfaces);
3099  }
3100  }
3101  else
3102  {
3103  numClusters = 0;
3104 
3105  s_worldData.numClusters = numClusters;
3106  s_worldData.clusters = ri.Hunk_Alloc((numClusters + 1) * sizeof(*s_worldData.clusters), h_low); // + supercluster
3107  }
3108 
3109  // create a super cluster that will be always used when no view cluster can be found
3110  Com_InitGrowList(&clusterSurfaces, 10000);
3111 
3112  for (i = 0, surface = s_worldData.surfaces; i < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; i++, surface++)
3113  {
3114  Com_AddToGrowList(&clusterSurfaces, surface);
3115  }
3116 
3117  cluster = &s_worldData.clusters[numClusters];
3118  cluster->numMarkSurfaces = clusterSurfaces.currentElements;
3119  cluster->markSurfaces = ri.Hunk_Alloc(cluster->numMarkSurfaces * sizeof(*cluster->markSurfaces), h_low);
3120 
3121  for (j = 0; j < cluster->numMarkSurfaces; j++)
3122  {
3123  cluster->markSurfaces[j] = (bspSurface_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&clusterSurfaces, j);
3124  }
3125 
3126  Com_DestroyGrowList(&clusterSurfaces);
3127 
3128  for (i = 0; i < MAX_VISCOUNTS; i++)
3129  {
3130  Com_InitGrowList(&s_worldData.clusterVBOSurfaces[i], 100);
3131  }
3132 
3133  //Ren_Print("noVis cluster contains %i bsp surfaces\n", cluster->numMarkSurfaces);
3134 
3135  Ren_Print("%i world clusters created\n", numClusters + 1);
3136 #endif // #if defined(USE_BSP_CLUSTERSURFACE_MERGING)
3137 
3138  // reset surfaces' viewCount
3139  for (i = 0, surface = s_worldData.surfaces; i < s_worldData.numSurfaces; i++, surface++)
3140  {
3141  surface->viewCount = -1;
3142  }
3143 
3144  for (j = 0, node = s_worldData.nodes; j < s_worldData.numnodes; j++, node++)
3145  {
3146  node->visCounts[0] = -1;
3147  }
3148 }
3149 
3153 static void R_CreateWorldVBO()
3154 {
3155  int s, i, j, k;
3156  int numVerts = 0;
3157  srfVert_t *verts;
3158  //srfVert_t *optimizedVerts;
3159  int numTriangles = 0;
3160  srfTriangle_t *triangles;
3161  //int numSurfaces;
3162  bspSurface_t *surface;
3163  //trRefLight_t *light;
3164 #ifdef LEGACY_DEBUG
3165  int startTime, endTime;
3166 
3167  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3168 #endif
3169 
3170  for (s = 0, surface = &s_worldData.surfaces[0]; s < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; s++, surface++)
3171  {
3172  if (*surface->data == SF_FACE)
3173  {
3174  srfSurfaceFace_t *face = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface->data;
3175 
3176  if (face->numVerts)
3177  {
3178  numVerts += face->numVerts;
3179  }
3180 
3181  if (face->numTriangles)
3182  {
3183  numTriangles += face->numTriangles;
3184  }
3185  }
3186  else if (*surface->data == SF_GRID)
3187  {
3188  srfGridMesh_t *grid = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface->data;
3189 
3190  if (grid->numVerts)
3191  {
3192  numVerts += grid->numVerts;
3193  }
3194 
3195  if (grid->numTriangles)
3196  {
3197  numTriangles += grid->numTriangles;
3198  }
3199  }
3200  else if (*surface->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3201  {
3202  srfTriangles_t *tri = (srfTriangles_t *) surface->data;
3203 
3204  if (tri->numVerts)
3205  {
3206  numVerts += tri->numVerts;
3207  }
3208 
3209  if (tri->numTriangles)
3210  {
3211  numTriangles += tri->numTriangles;
3212  }
3213  }
3214  else if (*surface->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3215  {
3216  srfFoliage_t *foliage = (srfFoliage_t *)surface->data;
3217 
3218  if (foliage->numVerts)
3219  {
3220  numVerts += foliage->numVerts * foliage->numInstances;
3221  }
3222 
3223  if (foliage->numTriangles)
3224  {
3225  numTriangles += foliage->numTriangles * foliage->numInstances;
3226  }
3227  }
3228  }
3229 
3230  if (!numVerts || !numTriangles)
3231  {
3232  return;
3233  }
3234 
3235  Ren_Developer("...calculating world VBO ( %i verts %i tris )\n", numVerts, numTriangles);
3236 
3237  // create arrays
3238 
3239  s_worldData.numVerts = numVerts;
3240  s_worldData.verts = verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t), h_low);
3241  //optimizedVerts = ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t));
3242 
3243  s_worldData.numTriangles = numTriangles;
3244  s_worldData.triangles = triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(numTriangles * sizeof(srfTriangle_t), h_low);
3245 
3246  // set up triangle indices
3247  numVerts = 0;
3248  numTriangles = 0;
3249  for (s = 0, surface = &s_worldData.surfaces[0]; s < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; s++, surface++)
3250  {
3251  if (*surface->data == SF_FACE)
3252  {
3253  srfSurfaceFace_t *srf = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface->data;
3254 
3255  srf->firstTriangle = numTriangles;
3256 
3257  if (srf->numTriangles)
3258  {
3259  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3260 
3261  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3262  {
3263  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3264  {
3265  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3266  }
3267  }
3268 
3269  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3270  }
3271 
3272  if (srf->numVerts)
3273  {
3274  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3275  }
3276  }
3277  else if (*surface->data == SF_GRID)
3278  {
3279  srfGridMesh_t *srf = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface->data;
3280 
3281  srf->firstTriangle = numTriangles;
3282 
3283  if (srf->numTriangles)
3284  {
3285  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3286 
3287  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3288  {
3289  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3290  {
3291  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3292  }
3293  }
3294 
3295  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3296  }
3297 
3298  if (srf->numVerts)
3299  {
3300  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3301  }
3302  }
