3303  else if (*surface->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3304  {
3305  srfTriangles_t *srf = (srfTriangles_t *) surface->data;
3306 
3307  srf->firstTriangle = numTriangles;
3308 
3309  if (srf->numTriangles)
3310  {
3311  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3312 
3313  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3314  {
3315  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3316  {
3317  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3318  }
3319  }
3320 
3321  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3322  }
3323 
3324  if (srf->numVerts)
3325  {
3326  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3327  }
3328  }
3329  else if (*surface->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3330  {
3331  srfFoliage_t *srf = (srfFoliage_t *)surface->data;
3332 
3333  srf->firstTriangle = numTriangles;
3334 
3335  if (srf->numTriangles)
3336  {
3337  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3338 
3339  for (i = 0; i < srf->numInstances; i++)
3340  {
3341  for (j = 0, tri = srf->triangles; j < srf->numTriangles; j++, tri++)
3342  {
3343  for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
3344  {
3345  triangles[numTriangles + j].indexes[k] = numVerts + tri->indexes[k];
3346  }
3347  }
3348  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3349  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3350  }
3351  }
3352  }
3353  }
3354 
3355  // build vertices
3356  numVerts = 0;
3357  for (s = 0, surface = &s_worldData.surfaces[0]; s < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; s++, surface++)
3358  {
3359  if (*surface->data == SF_FACE)
3360  {
3361  srfSurfaceFace_t *srf = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface->data;
3362 
3363  //srf->firstVert = numVerts;
3364 
3365  if (srf->numVerts)
3366  {
3367  for (i = 0; i < srf->numVerts; i++)
3368  {
3369  CopyVert(&srf->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3370  }
3371 
3372  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3373  }
3374  }
3375  else if (*surface->data == SF_GRID)
3376  {
3377  srfGridMesh_t *srf = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface->data;
3378 
3379  //srf->firstVert = numVerts;
3380 
3381  if (srf->numVerts)
3382  {
3383  for (i = 0; i < srf->numVerts; i++)
3384  {
3385  CopyVert(&srf->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3386  }
3387 
3388  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3389  }
3390  }
3391  else if (*surface->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3392  {
3393  srfTriangles_t *srf = (srfTriangles_t *) surface->data;
3394 
3395  //srf->firstVert = numVerts;
3396 
3397  if (srf->numVerts)
3398  {
3399  for (i = 0; i < srf->numVerts; i++)
3400  {
3401  CopyVert(&srf->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3402  }
3403 
3404  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3405  }
3406  }
3407  else if (*surface->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3408  {
3409  srfFoliage_t *srf = (srfFoliage_t *)surface->data;
3410 
3411  if (srf->numVerts)
3412  {
3413  srfVert_t vert;
3414  foliageInstance_t *finstance;
3415 
3416  for (i = 0; i < srf->numInstances; i++)
3417  {
3418  finstance = &srf->instances[i];
3419  for (j = 0; j < srf->numVerts; j++)
3420  {
3421  Com_Memcpy(&vert, &srf->verts[j], sizeof(vert));
3422  VectorAdd(vert.xyz, finstance->origin, vert.xyz);
3423 
3424  vert.lightColor[0] = finstance->color[0] / 255.f;
3425  vert.lightColor[1] = finstance->color[1] / 255.f;
3426  vert.lightColor[2] = finstance->color[2] / 255.f;
3427  vert.lightColor[3] = finstance->color[3] / 255.f;
3428 
3429  CopyVert(&vert, &verts[numVerts + j]);
3430  }
3431 
3432  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3433  }
3434  }
3435  }
3436  }
3437 
3438 #if 0
3439  // assign the two nearest cubeProbes
3440  if (tr.cubeProbes.currentElements > 0)
3441  {
3442  srfGeneric_t *srf;
3443  cubemapProbe_t *cubeProbe1, *cubeProbe2;
3444  float distance1, distance2;
3445  for (s = 0, surface = &s_worldData.surfaces[0]; s < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; s++, surface++)
3446  {
3447  if (*surface->data == SF_FACE) srf = (srfGeneric_t *)surface->data;
3448  else if (*surface->data == SF_GRID) srf = (srfGeneric_t *)surface->data;
3449  else if (*surface->data == SF_TRIANGLES) srf = (srfGeneric_t *)surface->data;
3450  else if (*surface->data == SF_FOLIAGE) srf = (srfGeneric_t *)surface->data;
3451  else continue;
3452 
3453  // find the two nearest cubeProbes
3454  R_FindTwoNearestCubeMaps(srf->origin, &cubeProbe1, &cubeProbe2, &distance1, &distance2);
3455  srf->cubemap1 = cubeProbe1->cubemap;
3456  srf->cubemap2 = cubeProbe2->cubemap;
3457  }
3458  }
3459 #endif
3460 
3461  s_worldData.vbo = R_CreateVBO2(va("staticBspModel0_VBO %i", 0), numVerts, verts,
3462  ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_LIGHTCOORD | ATTR_TANGENT | ATTR_BINORMAL |
3463  ATTR_NORMAL | ATTR_COLOR
3464  , VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3465 
3466  s_worldData.ibo = R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspModel0_IBO %i", 0), numTriangles, triangles, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3467 
3468 #ifdef LEGACY_DEBUG
3469  endTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3470  Ren_Developer("world VBO calculation time = %5.2f seconds\n", (endTime - startTime) / 1000.0);
3471 #endif
3472 
3473  // point triangle surfaces to world VBO
3474  for (s = 0, surface = &s_worldData.surfaces[0]; s < s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces; s++, surface++)
3475  {
3476  if (*surface->data == SF_FACE)
3477  {
3478  srfSurfaceFace_t *srf = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface->data;
3479 
3480  //if(r_vboFaces->integer && srf->numVerts && srf->numTriangles)
3481  {
3482  srf->vbo = s_worldData.vbo;
3483  srf->ibo = s_worldData.ibo;
3484  //srf->ibo = R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspModel0_planarSurface_IBO %i", k), srf->numTriangles, triangles + srf->firstTriangle, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3485  }
3486  }
3487  else if (*surface->data == SF_GRID)
3488  {
3489  srfGridMesh_t *srf = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface->data;
3490 
3491  //if(r_vboCurves->integer && srf->numVerts && srf->numTriangles)
3492  {
3493  srf->vbo = s_worldData.vbo;
3494  srf->ibo = s_worldData.ibo;
3495  //srf->ibo = R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspModel0_curveSurface_IBO %i", k), srf->numTriangles, triangles + srf->firstTriangle, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3496  }
3497  }
3498  else if (*surface->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3499  {
3500  srfTriangles_t *srf = (srfTriangles_t *) surface->data;
3501 
3502  //if(r_vboTriangles->integer && srf->numVerts && srf->numTriangles)
3503  {
3504  srf->vbo = s_worldData.vbo;
3505  srf->ibo = s_worldData.ibo;
3506  //srf->ibo = R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspModel0_triangleSurface_IBO %i", k), srf->numTriangles, triangles + srf->firstTriangle, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3507  }
3508  }
3509  else if (*surface->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3510  {
3511  srfFoliage_t *srf = (srfFoliage_t *) surface->data;
3512 
3513  //if(r_vboFoliage->integer && srf->numVerts && srf->numTriangles)
3514  {
3515  srf->vbo = s_worldData.vbo;
3516  srf->ibo = s_worldData.ibo;
3517  }
3518  }
3519  }
3520 
3521  // FIXME move this to somewhere else?
3522 #if CALC_REDUNDANT_SHADOWVERTS
3523 
3524  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3525 
3526  s_worldData.redundantVertsCalculationNeeded = 0;
3527  for (i = 0; i < s_worldData.numLights; i++)
3528  {
3529  light = &s_worldData.lights[i];
3530 
3531  if ((r_precomputedLighting->integer || r_vertexLighting->integer) && !light->noRadiosity)
3532  {
3533  continue;
3534  }
3535 
3536  s_worldData.redundantVertsCalculationNeeded++;
3537  }
3538 
3539  if (s_worldData.redundantVertsCalculationNeeded)
3540  {
3541  Ren_Print("...calculating redundant world vertices ( %i verts )\n", numVerts);
3542 
3543  s_worldData.redundantLightVerts = ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(int), h_low);
3544  BuildRedundantIndices(numVerts, verts, s_worldData.redundantLightVerts, CompareLightVert);
3545 
3546  s_worldData.redundantShadowVerts = ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(int), h_low);
3547  BuildRedundantIndices(numVerts, verts, s_worldData.redundantShadowVerts, CompareShadowVert);
3548 
3549  s_worldData.redundantShadowAlphaTestVerts = ri.Hunk_Alloc(numVerts * sizeof(int), h_low);
3550  BuildRedundantIndices(numVerts, verts, s_worldData.redundantShadowAlphaTestVerts, CompareShadowVertAlphaTest);
3551  }
3552 
3553  endTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3554  Ren_Print("redundant world vertices calculation time = %5.2f seconds\n", (endTime - startTime) / 1000.0);
3555 #endif
3556 
3557  //ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(triangles);
3558  //ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(optimizedVerts);
3559  //ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(verts);
3560 }
3561 
3565 static void R_CreateSubModelVBOs()
3566 {
3567  int i, j, k, l, m;
3568  int numVerts;
3569  srfVert_t *verts;
3570  srfVert_t *optimizedVerts;
3571  int numTriangles;
3572  srfTriangle_t *triangles;
3573  shader_t *shader, *oldShader;
3574  int lightmapNum, oldLightmapNum;
3575  int numSurfaces;
3576  bspSurface_t *surface, *surface2;
3577  bspSurface_t **surfacesSorted;
3578  bspModel_t *model;
3579  growList_t vboSurfaces;
3580  srfVBOMesh_t *vboSurf;
3581 
3582  for (m = 1, model = s_worldData.models; m < s_worldData.numModels; m++, model++)
3583  {
3584  // count number of static area surfaces
3585  numSurfaces = 0;
3586  for (k = 0; k < model->numSurfaces; k++)
3587  {
3588  surface = model->firstSurface + k;
3589  shader = surface->shader;
3590 
3591  if (shader->isSky)
3592  {
3593  continue;
3594  }
3595 
3596  if (shader->isPortal)
3597  {
3598  continue;
3599  }
3600 
3601  if (ShaderRequiresCPUDeforms(shader))
3602  {
3603  continue;
3604  }
3605 
3606  numSurfaces++;
3607  }
3608 
3609  if (!numSurfaces)
3610  {
3611  continue;
3612  }
3613 
3614  // build interaction caches list
3615  surfacesSorted = (bspSurface_t **)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(numSurfaces * sizeof(surfacesSorted[0]));
3616 
3617  numSurfaces = 0;
3618  for (k = 0; k < model->numSurfaces; k++)
3619  {
3620  surface = model->firstSurface + k;
3621  shader = surface->shader;
3622 
3623  if (shader->isSky)
3624  {
3625  continue;
3626  }
3627 
3628  if (shader->isPortal)
3629  {
3630  continue;
3631  }
3632 
3633  if (ShaderRequiresCPUDeforms(shader))
3634  {
3635  continue;
3636  }
3637 
3638  surfacesSorted[numSurfaces] = surface;
3639  numSurfaces++;
3640  }
3641 
3642  Com_InitGrowList(&vboSurfaces, 1024);
3643 
3644  // sort surfaces by shader
3645  qsort(surfacesSorted, numSurfaces, sizeof(*surfacesSorted), BSPSurfaceCompare);
3646 
3647  // create a VBO for each shader
3648  oldShader = NULL;
3649  oldLightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
3650 
3651  for (k = 0; k < numSurfaces; k++)
3652  {
3653  surface = surfacesSorted[k];
3654  shader = surface->shader;
3655  lightmapNum = surface->lightmapNum;
3656 
3657  if (shader != oldShader || (r_precomputedLighting->integer ? lightmapNum != oldLightmapNum : qfalse))
3658  {
3659  oldShader = shader;
3660  oldLightmapNum = lightmapNum;
3661 
3662  // count vertices and indices
3663  numVerts = 0;
3664  numTriangles = 0;
3665 
3666  for (l = k; l < numSurfaces; l++)
3667  {
3668  surface2 = surfacesSorted[l];
3669 
3670  if (surface2->shader != shader)
3671  {
3672  continue;
3673  }
3674 
3675  if (*surface2->data == SF_FACE)
3676  {
3677  srfSurfaceFace_t *face = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface2->data;
3678 
3679  if (face->numVerts)
3680  {
3681  numVerts += face->numVerts;
3682  }
3683 
3684  if (face->numTriangles)
3685  {
3686  numTriangles += face->numTriangles;
3687  }
3688  }
3689  else if (*surface2->data == SF_GRID)
3690  {
3691  srfGridMesh_t *grid = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface2->data;
3692 
3693  if (grid->numVerts)
3694  {
3695  numVerts += grid->numVerts;
3696  }
3697 
3698  if (grid->numTriangles)
3699  {
3700  numTriangles += grid->numTriangles;
3701  }
3702  }
3703  else if (*surface2->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3704  {
3705  srfTriangles_t *tri = (srfTriangles_t *) surface2->data;
3706 
3707  if (tri->numVerts)
3708  {
3709  numVerts += tri->numVerts;
3710  }
3711 
3712  if (tri->numTriangles)
3713  {
3714  numTriangles += tri->numTriangles;
3715  }
3716  }
3717  else if (*surface2->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3718  {
3719  srfFoliage_t *fol = (srfFoliage_t *) surface2->data;
3720 
3721  if (fol->numVerts)
3722  {
3723  numVerts += fol->numVerts;
3724  }
3725 
3726  if (fol->numTriangles)
3727  {
3728  numTriangles += fol->numTriangles;
3729  }
3730  }
3731  }
3732 
3733  if (!numVerts || !numTriangles)
3734  {
3735  continue;
3736  }
3737 
3738  Ren_Developer("...calculating entity mesh VBOs ( %s, %i verts %i tris )\n", shader->name, numVerts,
3739  numTriangles);
3740 
3741  // create surface
3742  vboSurf = (srfVBOMesh_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*vboSurf), h_low);
3743  Com_AddToGrowList(&vboSurfaces, vboSurf);
3744 
3745  vboSurf->surfaceType = SF_VBO_MESH;
3746  vboSurf->numIndexes = numTriangles * 3;
3747  vboSurf->numVerts = numVerts;
3748 
3749  vboSurf->shader = shader;
3750  vboSurf->lightmapNum = lightmapNum;
3751 
3752  // create arrays
3753  verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t));
3754  optimizedVerts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(numVerts * sizeof(srfVert_t));
3755  numVerts = 0;
3756 
3757  triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(numTriangles * sizeof(srfTriangle_t));
3758  numTriangles = 0;
3759 
3760  ClearBounds(vboSurf->bounds[0], vboSurf->bounds[1]);
3761 
3762  // build triangle indices
3763  for (l = k; l < numSurfaces; l++)
3764  {
3765  surface2 = surfacesSorted[l];
3766 
3767  if (surface2->shader != shader)
3768  {
3769  continue;
3770  }
3771 
3772  // set up triangle indices
3773  if (*surface2->data == SF_FACE)
3774  {
3775  srfSurfaceFace_t *srf = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface2->data;
3776 
3777  if (srf->numTriangles)
3778  {
3779  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3780 
3781  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3782  {
3783  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3784  {
3785  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3786  }
3787  }
3788 
3789  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3790  }
3791 
3792  if (srf->numVerts)
3793  {
3794  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3795  }
3796  }
3797  else if (*surface2->data == SF_GRID)
3798  {
3799  srfGridMesh_t *srf = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface2->data;
3800 
3801  if (srf->numTriangles)
3802  {
3803  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3804 
3805  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3806  {
3807  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3808  {
3809  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3810  }
3811  }
3812 
3813  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3814  }
3815 
3816  if (srf->numVerts)
3817  {
3818  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3819  }
3820  }
3821  else if (*surface2->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3822  {
3823  srfTriangles_t *srf = (srfTriangles_t *) surface2->data;
3824 
3825  if (srf->numTriangles)
3826  {
3827  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3828 
3829  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3830  {
3831  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3832  {
3833  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3834  }
3835  }
3836 
3837  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3838  }
3839 
3840  if (srf->numVerts)
3841  {
3842  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3843  }
3844  }
3845  else if (*surface2->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3846  {
3847  srfFoliage_t *srf = (srfFoliage_t *) surface2->data;
3848 
3849  if (srf->numTriangles)
3850  {
3851  srfTriangle_t *tri;
3852 
3853  for (i = 0, tri = srf->triangles; i < srf->numTriangles; i++, tri++)
3854  {
3855  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3856  {
3857  triangles[numTriangles + i].indexes[j] = numVerts + tri->indexes[j];
3858  }
3859  }
3860 
3861  numTriangles += srf->numTriangles;
3862  }
3863 
3864  if (srf->numVerts)
3865  {
3866  numVerts += srf->numVerts;
3867  }
3868  }
3869  }
3870 
3871  // build vertices
3872  numVerts = 0;
3873  for (l = k; l < numSurfaces; l++)
3874  {
3875  surface2 = surfacesSorted[l];
3876 
3877  if (surface2->shader != shader)
3878  {
3879  continue;
3880  }
3881 
3882  if (*surface2->data == SF_FACE)
3883  {
3884  srfSurfaceFace_t *cv = (srfSurfaceFace_t *) surface2->data;
3885 
3886  if (cv->numVerts)
3887  {
3888  for (i = 0; i < cv->numVerts; i++)
3889  {
3890  CopyVert(&cv->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3891 
3892  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[i].xyz, vboSurf->bounds[0], vboSurf->bounds[1]);
3893  }
3894 
3895  numVerts += cv->numVerts;
3896  }
3897  }
3898  else if (*surface2->data == SF_GRID)
3899  {
3900  srfGridMesh_t *cv = (srfGridMesh_t *) surface2->data;
3901 
3902  if (cv->numVerts)
3903  {
3904  for (i = 0; i < cv->numVerts; i++)
3905  {
3906  CopyVert(&cv->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3907 
3908  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[i].xyz, vboSurf->bounds[0], vboSurf->bounds[1]);
3909  }
3910 
3911  numVerts += cv->numVerts;
3912  }
3913  }
3914  else if (*surface2->data == SF_TRIANGLES)
3915  {
3916  srfTriangles_t *cv = (srfTriangles_t *) surface2->data;
3917 
3918  if (cv->numVerts)
3919  {
3920  for (i = 0; i < cv->numVerts; i++)
3921  {
3922  CopyVert(&cv->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3923 
3924  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[i].xyz, vboSurf->bounds[0], vboSurf->bounds[1]);
3925  }
3926 
3927  numVerts += cv->numVerts;
3928  }
3929  }
3930  else if (*surface2->data == SF_FOLIAGE)
3931  {
3932  srfFoliage_t *cv = (srfFoliage_t *) surface2->data;
3933 
3934  if (cv->numVerts)
3935  {
3936  for (i = 0; i < cv->numVerts; i++)
3937  {
3938  CopyVert(&cv->verts[i], &verts[numVerts + i]);
3939 
3940  AddPointToBounds(cv->verts[i].xyz, vboSurf->bounds[0], vboSurf->bounds[1]);
3941  }
3942 
3943  numVerts += cv->numVerts;
3944  }
3945  }
3946  }
3947 
3948  vboSurf->vbo =
3949  R_CreateVBO2(va("staticBspModel%i_VBO %i", m, vboSurfaces.currentElements), numVerts, verts,
3950  ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_LIGHTCOORD | ATTR_TANGENT | ATTR_BINORMAL | ATTR_NORMAL
3951  | ATTR_COLOR
3952  , VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3953 
3954  vboSurf->ibo =
3955  R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspModel%i_IBO %i", m, vboSurfaces.currentElements), numTriangles, triangles,
3956  VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
3957 
3958  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(triangles);
3959  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(optimizedVerts);
3960  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(verts);
3961  }
3962  }
3963 
3964  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(surfacesSorted);
3965 
3966  // move VBO surfaces list to hunk
3967  model->numVBOSurfaces = vboSurfaces.currentElements;
3968  model->vboSurfaces = (srfVBOMesh_t **)ri.Hunk_Alloc(model->numVBOSurfaces * sizeof(*model->vboSurfaces), h_low);
3969 
3970  for (i = 0; i < model->numVBOSurfaces; i++)
3971  {
3972  model->vboSurfaces[i] = (srfVBOMesh_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&vboSurfaces, i);
3973  }
3974 
3975  Com_DestroyGrowList(&vboSurfaces);
3976 
3977  Ren_Developer("%i VBO surfaces created for BSP submodel %i\n", model->numVBOSurfaces, m);
3978  }
3979 }
3980 
3987 static void R_LoadSurfaces(lump_t *surfs, lump_t *verts, lump_t *indexLump)
3988 {
3989  dsurface_t *in = (dsurface_t *)(fileBase + surfs->fileofs);
3990  bspSurface_t *out;
3991  drawVert_t *dv;
3992  int *indexes;
3993  int count;
3994  int numFaces = 0, numMeshes = 0, numTriSurfs = 0, numFlares = 0, numFoliages = 0;
3995  int i;
3996 
3997  Ren_Print("...loading surfaces\n");
3998 
3999  if (surfs->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4000  {
4001  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4002  }
4003  count = surfs->filelen / sizeof(*in);
4004 
4005  dv = (drawVert_t *)(fileBase + verts->fileofs);
4006  if (verts->filelen % sizeof(*dv))
4007  {
4008  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4009  }
4010 
4011  indexes = (int *)(fileBase + indexLump->fileofs);
4012  if (indexLump->filelen % sizeof(*indexes))
4013  {
4014  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4015  }
4016 
4017  out = (bspSurface_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(count * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4018 
4019  s_worldData.surfaces = out;
4020  s_worldData.numSurfaces = count;
4021 
4022  for (i = 0; i < count; i++, in++, out++)
4023  {
4024  switch (LittleLong(in->surfaceType))
4025  {
4026  case MST_PATCH:
4027  ParseMesh(in, dv, out);
4028  numMeshes++;
4029  break;
4030  case MST_TRIANGLE_SOUP:
4031  ParseTriSurf(in, dv, out, indexes);
4032  numTriSurfs++;
4033  break;
4034  case MST_PLANAR:
4035  ParseFace(in, dv, out, indexes);
4036  numFaces++;
4037  break;
4038  case MST_FLARE:
4039  ParseFlare(in, dv, out, indexes);
4040  numFlares++;
4041  break;
4042  case MST_FOLIAGE:
4043  ParseFoliage(in, dv, out, indexes);
4044  numFoliages++;
4045  break;
4046  default:
4047  Ren_Drop("Bad surfaceType");
4048  }
4049  }
4050 
4051  Ren_Print("...loaded %d faces, %i meshes, %i trisurfs, %i flares, %i foliages\n", numFaces, numMeshes, numTriSurfs,
4052  numFlares, numFoliages);
4053 
4054  if (r_stitchCurves->integer)
4055  {
4056  R_StitchAllPatches();
4057  }
4058 
4059  R_FixSharedVertexLodError();
4060 
4061  if (r_stitchCurves->integer)
4062  {
4063  R_MovePatchSurfacesToHunk();
4064  }
4065 }
4066 
4071 static void R_LoadSubmodels(lump_t *l)
4072 {
4073  dmodel_t *in = (dmodel_t *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4074  bspModel_t *out;
4075  int i, j, count;
4076 
4077  Ren_Print("...loading submodels\n");
4078 
4079  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4080  {
4081  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4082  }
4083  count = l->filelen / sizeof(*in);
4084 
4085  s_worldData.numModels = count;
4086  s_worldData.models = out = (bspModel_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(count * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4087 
4088  for (i = 0; i < count; i++, in++, out++)
4089  {
4090  model_t *model;
4091 
4092  model = R_AllocModel();
4093 
4094  etl_assert(model != NULL); // this should never happen
4095  if (model == NULL)
4096  {
4097  Ren_Drop("R_LoadSubmodels: R_AllocModel() failed");
4098  }
4099 
4100  model->type = MOD_BSP;
4101  model->bsp = out;
4102  Com_sprintf(model->name, sizeof(model->name), "*%d", i);
4103 
4104  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
4105  {
4106  out->bounds[0][j] = LittleFloat(in->mins[j]);
4107  out->bounds[1][j] = LittleFloat(in->maxs[j]);
4108  }
4109 
4110  out->firstSurface = s_worldData.surfaces + LittleLong(in->firstSurface);
4111  out->numSurfaces = LittleLong(in->numSurfaces);
4112 
4113  if (i == 0)
4114  {
4115  // add this for limiting VBO surface creation
4116  s_worldData.numWorldSurfaces = out->numSurfaces;
4117  }
4118 
4119  // for attaching fog brushes to models
4120  out->firstBrush = LittleLong(in->firstBrush);
4121  out->numBrushes = LittleLong(in->numBrushes);
4122 
4123  // allocate decal memory
4124  j = (i == 0 ? MAX_WORLD_DECALS : MAX_ENTITY_DECALS);
4125  out->decals = (decal_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(j * sizeof(*out->decals), h_low);
4126  Com_Memset(out->decals, 0, j * sizeof(*out->decals));
4127  }
4128 }
4129 
4130 //==================================================================
4131 
4137 static void R_SetParent(bspNode_t *node, bspNode_t *parent)
4138 {
4139  node->parent = parent;
4140 
4141  if (node->contents != CONTENTS_NODE)
4142  {
4143  // add node surfaces to bounds
4144  if (node->numMarkSurfaces > 0)
4145  {
4146  int c;
4147  bspSurface_t **mark;
4148  srfGeneric_t *gen;
4149  qboolean mergedSurfBounds;
4150 
4151  // add node surfaces to bounds
4152  mark = node->markSurfaces;
4153  c = node->numMarkSurfaces;
4154  ClearBounds(node->surfMins, node->surfMaxs);
4155  mergedSurfBounds = qfalse;
4156  while (c--)
4157  {
4158  gen = (srfGeneric_t *) (**mark).data;
4159  if (gen->surfaceType != SF_FACE &&
4160  gen->surfaceType != SF_GRID &&
4161  gen->surfaceType != SF_TRIANGLES &&
4162  gen->surfaceType != SF_FOLIAGE)
4163  {
4164  mark++;
4165  continue;
4166  }
4167  AddPointToBounds(gen->bounds[0], node->surfMins, node->surfMaxs);
4168  AddPointToBounds(gen->bounds[1], node->surfMins, node->surfMaxs);
4169  mark++;
4170  mergedSurfBounds = qtrue;
4171  }
4172 
4173  if (!mergedSurfBounds)
4174  {
4175  VectorCopy(node->mins, node->surfMins);
4176  VectorCopy(node->maxs, node->surfMaxs);
4177  }
4178  }
4179 
4180  return;
4181  }
4182 
4183  R_SetParent(node->children[0], node);
4184  R_SetParent(node->children[1], node);
4185 
4186  // surface bounds
4187  BoundsAdd(node->surfMins, node->surfMaxs, node->children[0]->surfMins, node->children[0]->surfMaxs);
4188  BoundsAdd(node->surfMins, node->surfMaxs, node->children[1]->surfMins, node->children[1]->surfMaxs);
4189 }
4190 
4196 static void R_LoadNodesAndLeafs(lump_t *nodeLump, lump_t *leafLump)
4197 {
4198  int i, j, p;
4199  dnode_t *in = (dnode_t *)(fileBase + nodeLump->fileofs);
4200  dleaf_t *inLeaf;
4201  bspNode_t *out;
4202  int numNodes, numLeafs;
4203  srfVert_t *verts = NULL;
4204  srfTriangle_t *triangles = NULL;
4205  IBO_t *volumeIBO = NULL;
4206  vec3_t mins, maxs;
4207  //vec3_t offset = {0.01, 0.01, 0.01};
4208 
4209  Ren_Print("...loading nodes and leaves\n");
4210 
4211  if (nodeLump->filelen % sizeof(dnode_t) || leafLump->filelen % sizeof(dleaf_t))
4212  {
4213  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4214  }
4215  numNodes = nodeLump->filelen / sizeof(dnode_t);
4216  numLeafs = leafLump->filelen / sizeof(dleaf_t);
4217 
4218  out = (bspNode_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc((numNodes + numLeafs) * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4219 
4220  s_worldData.nodes = out;
4221  s_worldData.numnodes = numNodes + numLeafs;
4222  s_worldData.numDecisionNodes = numNodes;
4223 
4224  // skybox optimization
4225  s_worldData.numSkyNodes = 0;
4226  s_worldData.skyNodes = (bspNode_t **)ri.Hunk_Alloc(WORLD_MAX_SKY_NODES * sizeof(*s_worldData.skyNodes), h_low);
4227 
4228  // load nodes
4229  for (i = 0; i < numNodes; i++, in++, out++)
4230  {
4231  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
4232  {
4233  out->mins[j] = LittleLong(in->mins[j]);
4234  out->maxs[j] = LittleLong(in->maxs[j]);
4235  }
4236 
4237  // surface bounds
4238  VectorCopy(out->mins, out->surfMins);
4239  VectorCopy(out->maxs, out->surfMaxs);
4240 
4241  p = LittleLong(in->planeNum);
4242  out->plane = s_worldData.planes + p;
4243 
4244  out->contents = CONTENTS_NODE; // differentiate from leafs
4245 
4246  for (j = 0; j < 2; j++)
4247  {
4248  p = LittleLong(in->children[j]);
4249  if (p >= 0)
4250  {
4251  out->children[j] = s_worldData.nodes + p;
4252  }
4253  else
4254  {
4255  out->children[j] = s_worldData.nodes + numNodes + (-1 - p);
4256  }
4257  }
4258  }
4259 
4260  // load leafs
4261  inLeaf = (dleaf_t *)(fileBase + leafLump->fileofs);
4262  for (i = 0; i < numLeafs; i++, inLeaf++, out++)
4263  {
4264  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
4265  {
4266  out->mins[j] = LittleLong(inLeaf->mins[j]);
4267  out->maxs[j] = LittleLong(inLeaf->maxs[j]);
4268  }
4269 
4270  // surface bounds
4271  ClearBounds(out->surfMins, out->surfMaxs);
4272 
4273  out->cluster = LittleLong(inLeaf->cluster);
4274  out->area = LittleLong(inLeaf->area);
4275 
4276  if (out->cluster >= s_worldData.numClusters)
4277  {
4278  s_worldData.numClusters = out->cluster + 1;
4279  }
4280 
4281  out->markSurfaces = s_worldData.markSurfaces + LittleLong(inLeaf->firstLeafSurface);
4282  out->numMarkSurfaces = LittleLong(inLeaf->numLeafSurfaces);
4283  }
4284 
4285  // chain decendants and compute surface bounds
4286  R_SetParent(s_worldData.nodes, NULL);
4287 
4288  // calculate occlusion query volumes
4289  for (j = 0, out = &s_worldData.nodes[0]; j < s_worldData.numnodes; j++, out++)
4290  {
4291  //if(out->contents != -1 && !out->numMarkSurfaces)
4292  // Ren_Drop( "leaf %i is empty", j);
4293 
4294  Com_Memset(out->lastVisited, -1, sizeof(out->lastVisited));
4295  Com_Memset(out->visible, qfalse, sizeof(out->visible));
4296  //out->occlusionQuerySamples[0] = 1;
4297 
4298  InitLink(&out->visChain, out);
4299  InitLink(&out->occlusionQuery, out);
4300  InitLink(&out->occlusionQuery2, out);
4301  //QueueInit(&node->multiQuery);
4302 
4303  glGenQueriesARB(MAX_VIEWS, out->occlusionQueryObjects);
4304 
4305  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4306  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4307  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4308 
4309  VectorCopy(out->mins, mins);
4310  VectorCopy(out->maxs, maxs);
4311 
4312  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
4313  {
4314  out->origin[i] = (mins[i] + maxs[i]) * 0.5f;
4315  }
4316 
4317 #if 0
4318  // HACK: make the AABB a little bit smaller to avoid z-fighting for the occlusion queries
4319  VectorAdd(mins, offset, mins);
4320  VectorSubtract(maxs, offset, maxs);
4321 #endif
4322  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, mins, maxs, colorWhite);
4323 
4324  if (j == 0)
4325  {
4326  verts = (srfVert_t *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(tess.numVertexes * sizeof(srfVert_t));
4327  triangles = (srfTriangle_t *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory((tess.numIndexes / 3) * sizeof(srfTriangle_t));
4328  }
4329 
4330  for (i = 0; i < tess.numVertexes; i++)
4331  {
4332  VectorCopy(tess.xyz[i], verts[i].xyz);
4333  }
4334 
4335  for (i = 0; i < (tess.numIndexes / 3); i++)
4336  {
4337  triangles[i].indexes[0] = tess.indexes[i * 3 + 0];
4338  triangles[i].indexes[1] = tess.indexes[i * 3 + 1];
4339  triangles[i].indexes[2] = tess.indexes[i * 3 + 2];
4340  }
4341 
4342  out->volumeVBO = R_CreateVBO2(va("staticBspNode_VBO %i", j), tess.numVertexes, verts, ATTR_POSITION, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
4343 
4344  if (j == 0)
4345  {
4346  out->volumeIBO = volumeIBO = R_CreateIBO2(va("staticBspNode_IBO %i", j), tess.numIndexes / 3, triangles, VBO_USAGE_STATIC);
4347  }
4348  else
4349  {
4350  out->volumeIBO = volumeIBO;
4351  }
4352 
4353  out->volumeVerts = tess.numVertexes;
4354  out->volumeIndexes = tess.numIndexes;
4355  }
4356 
4357  if (triangles)
4358  {
4359  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(triangles);
4360  }
4361  if (verts)
4362  {
4363  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(verts);
4364  }
4365 
4366  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4367  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4368  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4369 }
4370 
4371 //=============================================================================
4372 
4377 static void R_LoadShaders(lump_t *l)
4378 {
4379  int i, count;
4380  dshader_t *in = (dshader_t *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4381  dshader_t *out;
4382 
4383  Ren_Print("...loading shaders\n");
4384 
4385  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4386  {
4387  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4388  }
4389  count = l->filelen / sizeof(*in);
4390  out = (dshader_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(count * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4391 
4392  s_worldData.shaders = out;
4393  s_worldData.numShaders = count;
4394 
4395  Com_Memcpy(out, in, count * sizeof(*out));
4396 
4397  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
4398  {
4399  Ren_Developer("shader: '%s'\n", out[i].shader);
4400 
4401  out[i].surfaceFlags = LittleLong(out[i].surfaceFlags);
4402  out[i].contentFlags = LittleLong(out[i].contentFlags);
4403  }
4404 }
4405 
4410 static void R_LoadMarksurfaces(lump_t *l)
4411 {
4412  int i, j, count;
4413  int *in = (int *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4414  bspSurface_t **out;
4415 
4416  Ren_Print("...loading mark surfaces\n");
4417 
4418  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4419  {
4420  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4421  }
4422  count = l->filelen / sizeof(*in);
4423  out = (bspSurface_t **)ri.Hunk_Alloc(count * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4424 
4425  s_worldData.markSurfaces = out;
4426  s_worldData.numMarkSurfaces = count;
4427 
4428  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
4429  {
4430  j = LittleLong(in[i]);
4431  out[i] = s_worldData.surfaces + j;
4432  }
4433 }
4434 
4439 static void R_LoadPlanes(lump_t *l)
4440 {
4441  int i, j;
4442  cplane_t *out;
4443  dplane_t *in = (dplane_t *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4444  int count;
4445  int bits;
4446 
4447  Ren_Print("...loading planes\n");
4448 
4449  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4450  {
4451  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4452  }
4453  count = l->filelen / sizeof(*in);
4454  out = (cplane_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(count * 2 * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4455 
4456  s_worldData.planes = out;
4457  s_worldData.numplanes = count;
4458 
4459  for (i = 0; i < count; i++, in++, out++)
4460  {
4461  bits = 0;
4462  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
4463  {
4464  out->normal[j] = LittleFloat(in->normal[j]);
4465  if (out->normal[j] < 0)
4466  {
4467  bits |= 1 << j;
4468  }
4469  }
4470 
4471  out->dist = LittleFloat(in->dist);
4472  out->type = PlaneTypeForNormal(out->normal);
4473  out->signbits = bits;
4474  }
4475 }
4476 
4483 static void R_LoadFogs(lump_t *l, lump_t *brushesLump, lump_t *sidesLump)
4484 {
4485  int i, j;
4486  fog_t *out;
4487  dfog_t *fogs = (dfog_t *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4488  dbrush_t *brushes, *brush;
4489  dbrushside_t *sides;
4490  int count, brushesCount, sidesCount;
4491  int sideNum;
4492  int planeNum;
4493  shader_t *shader;
4494  float d;
4495  int firstSide;
4496 
4497  Ren_Print("...loading fogs\n");
4498 
4499  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*fogs))
4500  {
4501  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4502  }
4503  count = l->filelen / sizeof(*fogs);
4504 
4505  // create fog strucutres for them
4506  s_worldData.numFogs = count + 1;
4507  s_worldData.fogs = (fog_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(s_worldData.numFogs * sizeof(*out), h_low);
4508  out = s_worldData.fogs + 1;
4509 
4510  // reset global fog
4511  s_worldData.globalFog = -1;
4512 
4513  if (!count)
4514  {
4515  Ren_Print("no fog volumes loaded\n");
4516  return;
4517  }
4518 
4519  brushes = (dbrush_t *)(fileBase + brushesLump->fileofs);
4520  if (brushesLump->filelen % sizeof(*brushes))
4521  {
4522  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4523  }
4524  brushesCount = brushesLump->filelen / sizeof(*brushes);
4525 
4526  sides = (dbrushside_t *)(fileBase + sidesLump->fileofs);
4527  if (sidesLump->filelen % sizeof(*sides))
4528  {
4529  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4530  }
4531  sidesCount = sidesLump->filelen / sizeof(*sides);
4532 
4533  for (i = 0; i < count; i++, fogs++)
4534  {
4535  out->originalBrushNumber = LittleLong(fogs->brushNum);
4536 
4537  // global fog has a brush number of -1, and no visible side
4538  if (out->originalBrushNumber == -1)
4539  {
4540  VectorSet(out->bounds[0], MIN_WORLD_COORD, MIN_WORLD_COORD, MIN_WORLD_COORD);
4541  VectorSet(out->bounds[1], MAX_WORLD_COORD, MAX_WORLD_COORD, MAX_WORLD_COORD);
4542  firstSide = 0;
4543  }
4544  else
4545  {
4546  if ((unsigned)out->originalBrushNumber >= brushesCount)
4547  {
4548  Ren_Drop("fog brushNumber out of range");
4549  }
4550  brush = brushes + out->originalBrushNumber;
4551 
4552  firstSide = LittleLong(brush->firstSide);
4553 
4554  if ((unsigned)firstSide > sidesCount - 6)
4555  {
4556  Ren_Drop("fog brush sideNumber out of range");
4557  }
4558 
4559  // find which bsp submodel the fog volume belongs to
4560  for (j = 0; j < s_worldData.numModels; j++)
4561  {
4562  if (out->originalBrushNumber >= s_worldData.models[j].firstBrush &&
4563  out->originalBrushNumber < (s_worldData.models[j].firstBrush + s_worldData.models[j].numBrushes))
4564  {
4565  out->modelNum = j;
4566  break;
4567  }
4568  }
4569 
4570  // brushes are always sorted with the axial sides first
4571  sideNum = firstSide + 0;
4572  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4573  out->bounds[0][0] = -s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4574 
4575  sideNum = firstSide + 1;
4576  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4577  out->bounds[1][0] = s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4578 
4579  sideNum = firstSide + 2;
4580  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4581  out->bounds[0][1] = -s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4582 
4583  sideNum = firstSide + 3;
4584  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4585  out->bounds[1][1] = s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4586 
4587  sideNum = firstSide + 4;
4588  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4589  out->bounds[0][2] = -s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4590 
4591  sideNum = firstSide + 5;
4592  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[sideNum].planeNum);
4593  out->bounds[1][2] = s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4594  }
4595 
4596  // get information from the shader for fog parameters
4597  shader = R_FindShader(fogs->shader, SHADER_3D_DYNAMIC, qtrue);
4598 
4599  out->fogParms = shader->fogParms;
4600 
4601  out->color[0] = shader->fogParms.color[0] * tr.identityLight;
4602  out->color[1] = shader->fogParms.color[1] * tr.identityLight;
4603  out->color[2] = shader->fogParms.color[2] * tr.identityLight;
4604  out->color[3] = 1;
4605 
4606  d = shader->fogParms.depthForOpaque < 1 ? 1 : shader->fogParms.depthForOpaque;
4607  out->tcScale = 1.0f / (d * 8);
4608 
4609  // global fog sets clearcolor/zfar
4610  if (out->originalBrushNumber == -1)
4611  {
4612  s_worldData.globalFog = i + 1;
4613  VectorCopy(shader->fogParms.color, s_worldData.globalOriginalFog);
4614  s_worldData.globalOriginalFog[3] = shader->fogParms.depthForOpaque;
4615  }
4616 
4617  // set the gradient vector
4618  sideNum = LittleLong(fogs->visibleSide);
4619 
4620  // made this check a little more strenuous (was sideNum == -1)
4621  if (sideNum < 0 || sideNum >= sidesCount)
4622  {
4623  out->hasSurface = qfalse;
4624  }
4625  else
4626  {
4627  out->hasSurface = qtrue;
4628  planeNum = LittleLong(sides[firstSide + sideNum].planeNum);
4629  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, s_worldData.planes[planeNum].normal, out->surface);
4630  out->surface[3] = -s_worldData.planes[planeNum].dist;
4631  }
4632 
4633  out++;
4634  }
4635 
4636  Ren_Developer("%i fog volumes loaded\n", s_worldData.numFogs);
4637 }
4638 
4643 void R_LoadLightGrid(lump_t *l)
4644 {
4645  int i, j, k;
4646  vec3_t maxs;
4647  world_t *w = &s_worldData;
4648  float *wMins, *wMaxs;
4649  dgridPoint_t *in;
4650  bspGridPoint_t *gridPoint;
4651  float lat, lng;
4652  int gridStep[3];
4653  int pos[3];
4654  float posFloat[3];
4655  byte tmpAmbient[4], tmpDirected[4];
4656 
4657  Ren_Print("...loading light grid\n");
4658 
4659  w->lightGridInverseSize[0] = 1.0f / w->lightGridSize[0];
4660  w->lightGridInverseSize[1] = 1.0f / w->lightGridSize[1];
4661  w->lightGridInverseSize[2] = 1.0f / w->lightGridSize[2];
4662 
4663  wMins = w->models[0].bounds[0];
4664  wMaxs = w->models[0].bounds[1];
4665 
4666  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
4667  {
4668  w->lightGridOrigin[i] = w->lightGridSize[i] * ceil(wMins[i] / w->lightGridSize[i]);
4669  maxs[i] = w->lightGridSize[i] * floor(wMaxs[i] / w->lightGridSize[i]);
4670  w->lightGridBounds[i] = (maxs[i] - w->lightGridOrigin[i]) / w->lightGridSize[i] + 1;
4671  }
4672 
4673  w->numLightGridPoints = w->lightGridBounds[0] * w->lightGridBounds[1] * w->lightGridBounds[2];
4674 
4675  Ren_Developer("grid size (%i %i %i)\n", (int)w->lightGridSize[0], (int)w->lightGridSize[1],
4676  (int)w->lightGridSize[2]);
4677  Ren_Developer("grid bounds (%i %i %i)\n", (int)w->lightGridBounds[0], (int)w->lightGridBounds[1],
4678  (int)w->lightGridBounds[2]);
4679 
4680  if (l->filelen != w->numLightGridPoints * sizeof(dgridPoint_t))
4681  {
4682  Ren_Warning("WARNING: light grid mismatch\n");
4683  w->lightGridData = NULL;
4684  return;
4685  }
4686 
4687  in = (dgridPoint_t *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
4688  if (l->filelen % sizeof(*in))
4689  {
4690  Ren_Drop("LoadMap: funny lump size in %s", s_worldData.name);
4691  }
4692  gridPoint = (bspGridPoint_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(w->numLightGridPoints * sizeof(*gridPoint), h_low);
4693 
4694  w->lightGridData = gridPoint;
4695  //Com_Memcpy(w->lightGridData, (void *)(fileBase + l->fileofs), l->filelen);
4696 
4697  for (i = 0; i < w->numLightGridPoints; i++, in++, gridPoint++)
4698  {
4699  tmpAmbient[0] = in->ambient[0];
4700  tmpAmbient[1] = in->ambient[1];
4701  tmpAmbient[2] = in->ambient[2];
4702  tmpAmbient[3] = 255;
4703 
4704  tmpDirected[0] = in->directed[0];
4705  tmpDirected[1] = in->directed[1];
4706  tmpDirected[2] = in->directed[2];
4707  tmpDirected[3] = 255;
4708 
4709  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(tmpAmbient, tmpAmbient);
4710  R_ColorShiftLightingBytes(tmpDirected, tmpDirected);
4711 
4712  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
4713  {
4714  gridPoint->ambientColor[j] = tmpAmbient[j] / 255.0f;
4715  gridPoint->directedColor[j] = tmpDirected[j] / 255.0f;
4716  }
4717 
4718  gridPoint->ambientColor[3] = 1.0f;
4719  gridPoint->directedColor[3] = 1.0f;
4720 
4721  // standard spherical coordinates to cartesian coordinates conversion
4722 
4723  // decode X as cos( lat ) * sin( long )
4724  // decode Y as sin( lat ) * sin( long )
4725  // decode Z as cos( long )
4726 
4727  // Lat = 0 at (1,0,0) to 360 (-1,0,0), encoded in 8-bit sine table format
4728  // Lng = 0 at (0,0,1) to 180 (0,0,-1), encoded in 8-bit sine table format <--- 180Â°?!
4729 
4730  if (in->latLong[0] == 0x80 && in->latLong[1] == 0x00)
4731  {
4732  gridPoint->direction[0] = 0.0f;
4733  gridPoint->direction[1] = 0.0f;
4734  gridPoint->direction[2] = -1.0f;
4735  }
4736  else
4737  {
4738  lat = DEG2RAD(in->latLong[1] * (360.0 / 256.0)); // calculate with 256 instead of 255 to hit exact PI
4739  lng = DEG2RAD(in->latLong[0] * (360.0 / 256.0));
4740 
4741  gridPoint->direction[0] = cos(lat) * sin(lng);
4742  gridPoint->direction[1] = sin(lat) * sin(lng);
4743  gridPoint->direction[2] = cos(lng);
4744  }
4745 
4746  //Ren_Print(" %i %i %f %f\n" , in->latLong[1], in->latLong[0], lat , lng);
4747 
4748  // debug print to see if the XBSP format is correct
4749  //Ren_Print("%9d Amb: (%03.1f %03.1f %03.1f) Dir: (%03.1f %03.1f %03.1f)\n",
4750  // i, gridPoint->ambientColor[0], gridPoint->ambientColor[1], gridPoint->ambientColor[2], gridPoint->direction[0], gridPoint->direction[1], gridPoint->direction[2]);
4751  }
4752 
4753  // calculate grid point positions
4754  gridStep[0] = 1;
4755  gridStep[1] = w->lightGridBounds[0];
4756  gridStep[2] = w->lightGridBounds[0] * w->lightGridBounds[1];
4757 
4758  for (i = 0; i < w->lightGridBounds[0]; i += 1)
4759  {
4760  for (j = 0; j < w->lightGridBounds[1]; j += 1)
4761  {
4762  for (k = 0; k < w->lightGridBounds[2]; k += 1)
4763  {
4764  pos[0] = i;
4765  pos[1] = j;
4766  pos[2] = k;
4767 
4768  posFloat[0] = i * w->lightGridSize[0];
4769  posFloat[1] = j * w->lightGridSize[1];
4770  posFloat[2] = k * w->lightGridSize[2];
4771 
4772  gridPoint = w->lightGridData + pos[0] * gridStep[0] + pos[1] * gridStep[1] + pos[2] * gridStep[2];
4773 
4774  VectorAdd(posFloat, w->lightGridOrigin, gridPoint->origin);
4775  }
4776  }
4777  }
4778 
4779  Ren_Developer("%i light grid points created\n", w->numLightGridPoints);
4780 }
4781 
4785 qboolean setProjTargetOrigin(char *lightDefs, char *targetname, trRefLight_t *light)
4786 {
4787  char *p = lightDefs, *token;
4788  char keyname[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
4789  char value[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
4790  qboolean isInfoNull, isRequestedTarget;
4791  char *origin;
4792 
4793  if (!targetname || !targetname[0])
4794  {
4795  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: no target set!\n");
4796  return qfalse;
4797  }
4798 
4799  //Ren_Print("searching for targetname %s\n", targetname);
4800 
4801  // count lights
4802  while (1)
4803  {
4804  // parse {
4805  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
4806 
4807  if (!*token)
4808  {
4809  // end of entities string
4810  break;
4811  }
4812 
4813  if (*token != '{')
4814  {
4815  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: expected { found '%s'\n", token);
4816  break;
4817  }
4818 
4819  isInfoNull = qfalse;
4820  isRequestedTarget = qfalse;
4821  origin = NULL;
4822 
4823  // parse epairs
4824  while (1)
4825  {
4826  // parse key
4827  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
4828 
4829  if (*token == '}')
4830  {
4831  break;
4832  }
4833 
4834  if (!*token)
4835  {
4836  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: EOF without closing bracket\n");
4837  break;
4838  }
4839 
4840  Q_strncpyz(keyname, token, sizeof(keyname));
4841 
4842  // parse value
4843  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qfalse);
4844 
4845  if (!*token)
4846  {
4847  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: missing value for key '%s'\n", keyname);
4848  continue;
4849  }
4850 
4851  Q_strncpyz(value, token, sizeof(value));
4852 
4853  // check if this entity is a light
4854  // light related ents are
4855  // light, lightJunior, dlight, corona, info_null (spotlights)
4856  // see also misc_light_surface, misc_spotlight
4857  //if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && (!Q_stricmp(value, "light") || !Q_stricmp(value, "lightJunior") || !Q_stricmp(value, "dlight")))
4858  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && (!Q_stricmp(value, "info_null")))
4859  {
4860  isInfoNull = qtrue;
4861  }
4862 
4863  // note: per definition lightJunior never has a target
4864  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "targetname") && !Q_stricmp(value, targetname))
4865  {
4866  isRequestedTarget = qtrue;
4867  }
4868 
4869  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "origin"))
4870  {
4871  origin = ri.Z_Malloc(strlen(value) + 1);
4872  strcpy(origin, value);
4873  }
4874  }
4875 
4876  if (*token != '}')
4877  {
4878  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: expected } found '%s'\n", token);
4879 
4880  if (origin)
4881  {
4882  ri.Free(origin);
4883  }
4884 
4885  break;
4886  }
4887 
4888  if (isInfoNull && isRequestedTarget)
4889  {
4890  if (origin)
4891  {
4892  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projTarget[0], &light->l.projTarget[1], &light->l.projTarget[2]);
4893  ri.Free(origin);
4894  }
4895  else
4896  {
4897  Ren_Warning("setProjTargetOrigin WARNING: requested target '%s' has no origin\n", targetname);
4898  }
4899 
4900  return qtrue; // we are done
4901  }
4902 
4903  if (origin)
4904  {
4905  ri.Free(origin);
4906  }
4907  }
4908 
4909  return qfalse;
4910 }
4911 
4912 // debug
4913 #define RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR 1
4914 
4915 
4920 void resetRefLight(trRefLight_t *light)
4921 {
4922  QuatClear(light->l.rotation); // reset rotation because it may be set to the rotation of other entities
4923  VectorClear(light->l.center);
4924 
4925  light->l.color[0] = 1;
4926  light->l.color[1] = 1;
4927  light->l.color[2] = 1;
4928 
4929  light->l.scale = r_lightScale->value;
4930 
4931  light->l.radius[0] = 64 * RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR; // default radius 64
4932  light->l.radius[1] = 64 * RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR;
4933  light->l.radius[2] = 64 * RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR;
4934 
4935  VectorClear(light->l.projTarget);
4936  VectorClear(light->l.projRight);
4937  VectorClear(light->l.projUp);
4938  VectorClear(light->l.projStart);
4939  VectorClear(light->l.projEnd);
4940 
4941  light->l.inverseShadows = qfalse;
4942 
4943  light->isStatic = qtrue;
4944  light->noRadiosity = qfalse;
4945  light->additive = qtrue;
4946 
4947  light->shadowLOD = 0;
4948 
4949  light->l.rlType = RL_OMNI;
4950 }
4951 
5003 void R_LoadLights(char *lightDefs)
5004 {
5005  //char *s;
5006  char *p = lightDefs, *token;
5007  char keyname[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
5008  char value[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
5009  qboolean isLight, hasInfoNull;
5010  int numEntities = 1; // parsed worldspawn so far
5011  int numLights = 0;
5012  int numOmniLights = 0;
5013  int numProjLights = 0;
5014  int numParallelLights = 0;
5015  trRefLight_t *light;
5016  int i = 0;
5017  int numInfoNull = 0;
5018  char *target;
5019 
5020  // count lights
5021  while (1)
5022  {
5023  // parse {
5024  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
5025 
5026  if (!*token)
5027  {
5028  // end of entities string
5029  break;
5030  }
5031 
5032  if (*token != '{')
5033  {
5034  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: expected { found '%s'\n", token);
5035  break;
5036  }
5037 
5038  // new entity
5039  isLight = qfalse;
5040  hasInfoNull = qfalse;
5041 
5042  // parse epairs
5043  while (1)
5044  {
5045  // parse key
5046  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
5047 
5048  if (*token == '}')
5049  {
5050  break;
5051  }
5052 
5053  if (!*token)
5054  {
5055  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: EOF without closing bracket\n");
5056  break;
5057  }
5058 
5059  Q_strncpyz(keyname, token, sizeof(keyname));
5060 
5061  // parse value
5062  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qfalse);
5063 
5064  if (!*token)
5065  {
5066  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: missing value for key '%s'\n", keyname);
5067  continue;
5068  }
5069 
5070  Q_strncpyz(value, token, sizeof(value));
5071 
5072  // check if this entity is a light
5073  // light related ents are
5074  // light, lightJunior, dlight, corona, info_null (spotlights)
5075  // see also misc_light_surface, misc_spotlight
5076  //if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && (!Q_stricmp(value, "light") || !Q_stricmp(value, "lightJunior") || !Q_stricmp(value, "dlight")))
5077  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && (!Q_stricmp(value, "light") || !Q_stricmp(value, "lightJunior")))
5078  {
5079  isLight = qtrue;
5080  }
5081 
5082  // note: per definition lightJunior never has a target
5083  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "target") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "targetname"))
5084  {
5085  hasInfoNull = qtrue;
5086  }
5087  }
5088 
5089  if (*token != '}')
5090  {
5091  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: expected } found '%s'\n", token);
5092  break;
5093  }
5094 
5095  if (isLight)
5096  {
5097  numLights++;
5098  }
5099 
5100  if (isLight && hasInfoNull)
5101  {
5102  numInfoNull++;
5103  }
5104 
5105  numEntities++;
5106  }
5107 
5108  Ren_Developer("%i total entities counted\n", numEntities);
5109  Ren_Print("%i total lights and %i light targets counted\n", numLights, numInfoNull);
5110 
5111  s_worldData.numLights = numLights;
5112 
5113  if (!numLights)
5114  {
5115  s_worldData.lights = NULL;
5116  return;
5117  }
5118 
5119  // FIXME add 1 dummy light so we don't trash the hunk memory system ...
5120  s_worldData.lights = (trRefLight_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc((s_worldData.numLights + 1) * sizeof(trRefLight_t), h_low);
5121 
5122  // basic light setup
5123  for (i = 0, light = s_worldData.lights; i < s_worldData.numLights; i++, light++)
5124  {
5125  resetRefLight(light);
5126  }
5127 
5128  // parse lights
5129  p = lightDefs;
5130  numEntities = 1; // why 1? - worldspawn?
5131  light = &s_worldData.lights[0];
5132 
5133  while (1)
5134  {
5135  // parse {
5136  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
5137 
5138  if (!*token)
5139  {
5140  // end of entities string
5141  break;
5142  }
5143 
5144  if (*token != '{')
5145  {
5146  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: expected { found '%s'\n", token);
5147  break;
5148  }
5149 
5150  // new entity
5151  isLight = qfalse;
5152  target = NULL;
5153 
5154  // parse epairs
5155  while (1)
5156  {
5157  // parse key
5158  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
5159 
5160  if (*token == '}')
5161  {
5162  break;
5163  }
5164 
5165  if (!*token)
5166  {
5167  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: EOF without closing bracket\n");
5168  break;
5169  }
5170 
5171  Q_strncpyz(keyname, token, sizeof(keyname));
5172 
5173  // parse value
5174  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qfalse);
5175 
5176  if (!*token)
5177  {
5178  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: missing value for key '%s'\n", keyname);
5179  continue;
5180  }
5181 
5182  Q_strncpyz(value, token, sizeof(value));
5183 
5184  // check if this entity is a light
5185  //if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && (!Q_stricmp(value, "light") || !Q_stricmp(value, "lightJunior") || !Q_stricmp(value, "dlight")))
5186  // Lights pointed at a target will be spotlights.(Some options will create a Q3map2 light shader for your map"
5187  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && !Q_stricmp(value, "light"))
5188  {
5189  isLight = qtrue;
5190  }
5191  // Light that only affects dynamic game models, but does not contribute to lightmaps.
5192  // Lights pointed at a target will be spotlights. (Some options will create a Q3map2 light shader for your map.)
5193  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && !Q_stricmp(value, "lightJunior"))
5194  {
5195  isLight = qtrue;
5196  }
5197  // check for origin
5198  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "origin") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_origin")) // ETL (origin)
5199  {
5200  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.origin[0], &light->l.origin[1], &light->l.origin[2]);
5201  }
5202  // check for origin
5203  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "spawnflags")) // ETL (spawnflags)
5204  {
5205  // FIXME: light: ANGLE, NONLINEAR, Q3MAP_NON-DYNAMIC
5206  // FIXME: lightJunior: ANGLE, NEGATIVE_POINT, NEGATIVE_SPOT, NONLINEAR
5207  int spawnflags = atoi(value);
5208  }
5209  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "angle")) // ETL (angle)
5210  {
5211  // FIXME
5212  int angle = atoi(value);
5213  }
5214  // Falloff/radius adjustment value. Multiply the run of the slope by "fade" (1.0f default only valid for "Linear" lights wolf)
5215  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "fade")) // ETL (fade)
5216  {
5217  // FIXME
5218  float fade = atoi(value);
5219  }
5220  // check for center
5221  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_center"))
5222  {
5223  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.center[0], &light->l.center[1], &light->l.center[2]);
5224  }
5225  // check for color - weighted RGB value of light color ('k' key)(default white - 1.0 1.0 1.0)
5226  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "_color")) // ETL
5227  {
5228  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.color[0], &light->l.color[1], &light->l.color[2]);
5229  }
5230  // check for radius - overrides the default 64 unit radius of a spotlight at the target point
5231  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_radius") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "radius")) // ETL (radius)
5232  {
5233  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.radius[0], &light->l.radius[1], &light->l.radius[2]);
5234 
5235  //VectorScale();
5236  light->l.radius[0] *= RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR;
5237  light->l.radius[1] *= RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR;
5238  light->l.radius[2] *= RADIUS_MULTIPLICATOR;
5239  }
5240  // check for light_target
5241  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_target"))
5242  {
5243  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projTarget[0], &light->l.projTarget[1], &light->l.projTarget[2]);
5244 
5245  light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5246  }
5247  // lights pointed at a target will be spotlights
5248  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "target")) // ETL
5249  {
5250  target = ri.Z_Malloc(strlen(value) + 1);
5251  strcpy(target, value);
5252 
5253  //light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5254  }
5255  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "targetname")) // ETL
5256  {
5257  // see target, this is just duplicate in bsp
5258  }
5259  // set this key to 1 on a spotlight to make an infinite sun light
5260  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "_sun")) // ETL
5261  {
5262  // FIXME: inspect (has to be set on spotlight ..., target?!)
5263  // is this info exported? no sun/moon on radar/goldrush ...
5264  //light->l.rlType = RL_DIRECTIONAL;
5265  }
5266  // check for light_right
5267  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_right"))
5268  {
5269  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projRight[0], &light->l.projRight[1], &light->l.projRight[2]);
5270 
5271  light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5272  }
5273  // check for light_up
5274  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_up"))
5275  {
5276  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projUp[0], &light->l.projUp[1], &light->l.projUp[2]);
5277 
5278  light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5279  }
5280  // check for light_start
5281  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_start"))
5282  {
5283  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projStart[0], &light->l.projStart[1], &light->l.projStart[2]);
5284 
5285  light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5286  }
5287  // check for light_end
5288  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_end"))
5289  {
5290  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &light->l.projEnd[0], &light->l.projEnd[1], &light->l.projEnd[2]);
5291 
5292  light->l.rlType = RL_PROJ;
5293  }
5294  // Overrides the default 300 intensity
5295  // fixed: xreal did set radius ...
5296  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "_light")) // ETL (light)
5297  {
5298  // 300 is 100% = default intensity
5299  light->l.scale = atof(value) / 300.f * r_lightScale->value;
5300 
5301  if (light->l.scale < 0)
5302  {
5303  light->l.scale = r_lightScale->value;
5304  }
5305 
5306  if (!r_hdrRendering->integer || !glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable || !glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable || !glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable)
5307  {
5308  if (light->l.scale > r_lightScale->value)
5309  {
5310  light->l.scale = r_lightScale->value;
5311  }
5312  }
5313  }
5314  // check for scale
5315  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_scale"))
5316  {
5317  light->l.scale = atof(value);
5318 
5319  if (!r_hdrRendering->integer || !glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable || !glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable || !glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable)
5320  {
5321  if (light->l.scale > r_lightScale->value)
5322  {
5323  light->l.scale = r_lightScale->value;
5324  }
5325  }
5326  }
5327  // check for light shader
5328  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "texture"))
5329  {
5330  light->l.attenuationShader = RE_RegisterShaderLightAttenuation(value);
5331  }
5332  // check for rotation
5333  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "rotation") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "light_rotation"))
5334  {
5335  mat4_t rotation;
5336 
5337  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f", &rotation[0], &rotation[1], &rotation[2],
5338  &rotation[4], &rotation[5], &rotation[6], &rotation[8], &rotation[9], &rotation[10]);
5339 
5340  quat_from_mat4(light->l.rotation, rotation);
5341  }
5342  // check if this light does not cast any shadows
5343  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "noshadows") && !Q_stricmp(value, "1"))
5344  {
5345  light->l.noShadows = qtrue;
5346  }
5347  // check if this light does not contribute to the global lightmapping
5348  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "noradiosity") && !Q_stricmp(value, "1"))
5349  {
5350  light->noRadiosity = qtrue;
5351  }
5352  // check if this light is a parallel sun light
5353  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "parallel") && !Q_stricmp(value, "1"))
5354  {
5355  light->l.rlType = RL_DIRECTIONAL;
5356  }
5357  }
5358 
5359  if (*token != '}')
5360  {
5361  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: expected } found '%s'\n", token);
5362 
5363  if (target)
5364  {
5365  ri.Free(target);
5366  }
5367 
5368  break;
5369  }
5370 
5371  if (!isLight)
5372  {
5373  resetRefLight(light);
5374  }
5375  else
5376  {
5377  if ((numOmniLights + numProjLights + numParallelLights) < s_worldData.numLights)
5378  {
5379  switch (light->l.rlType)
5380  {
5381  case RL_OMNI:
5382  if (target) // might have a target
5383  {
5384  if (!setProjTargetOrigin(lightDefs, target, light))
5385  {
5386  // goldrush throws this because of missing info_null 't713'
5387  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: no projection target found for %s\n", target);
5388  }
5389  else
5390  {
5391  Ren_Developer("R_LoadLights target for %s\n", target);
5392  }
5393  }
5394  numOmniLights++;
5395  break;
5396  case RL_PROJ: // must have a target
5397  if (!setProjTargetOrigin(lightDefs, target, light))
5398  {
5399  // goldrush throws this because of missing info_null 't713'
5400  Ren_Warning("R_LoadLights WARNING: no projection target found for %s\n", target);
5401  }
5402  numProjLights++;
5403  break;
5404  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
5405  numParallelLights++;
5406  break;
5407  default:
5408  break;
5409  }
5410 
5411  light++;
5412  }
5413  }
5414 
5415  if (target)
5416  {
5417  ri.Free(target);
5418  }
5419 
5420  numEntities++;
5421  }
5422 
5423  if ((numOmniLights + numProjLights + numParallelLights) != s_worldData.numLights)
5424  {
5425  Ren_Drop("counted %i lights and parsed %i lights", s_worldData.numLights, (numOmniLights + numProjLights + numParallelLights));
5426  }
5427 
5428  Ren_Developer("%i total entities parsed\n", numEntities);
5429  Ren_Developer("%i total lights parsed\n", numOmniLights + numProjLights + numParallelLights);
5430  Ren_Print("%i omni-directional lights parsed\n", numOmniLights);
5431  Ren_Print("%i projective lights parsed\n", numProjLights);
5432  Ren_Print("%i directional lights parsed\n", numParallelLights);
5433 }
5434 
5439 void R_LoadEntities(lump_t *l)
5440 {
5441  char *p, *token, *s;
5442  char keyname[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
5443  char value[MAX_TOKEN_CHARS];
5444  world_t *w = &s_worldData;
5445 
5446  Ren_Print("...loading entities\n");
5447 
5448  w->lightGridSize[0] = 64;
5449  w->lightGridSize[1] = 64;
5450  w->lightGridSize[2] = 128;
5451 
5452  // store for reference by the cgame
5453  w->entityString = (char *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(l->filelen + 1, h_low);
5454  //strcpy(w->entityString, (char *)(fileBase + l->fileofs));
5455  Q_strncpyz(w->entityString, (char *)(fileBase + l->fileofs), l->filelen + 1);
5456  w->entityParsePoint = w->entityString;
5457 
5458 #if 1
5459  p = w->entityString;
5460 #else
5461  p = (char *)(fileBase + l->fileofs);
5462 #endif
5463 
5464  // only parse the world spawn
5465  while (1)
5466  {
5467  // parse key
5468  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qtrue);
5469 
5470  if (!*token)
5471  {
5472  Ren_Warning("R_LoadEntities WARNING: unexpected end of entities string while parsing worldspawn\n");
5473  break;
5474  }
5475 
5476  if (*token == '{')
5477  {
5478  continue;
5479  }
5480 
5481  if (*token == '}')
5482  {
5483  break;
5484  }
5485 
5486  Q_strncpyz(keyname, token, sizeof(keyname));
5487 
5488  // parse value
5489  token = COM_ParseExt2(&p, qfalse);
5490 
5491  if (!*token)
5492  {
5493  continue;
5494  }
5495 
5496  Q_strncpyz(value, token, sizeof(value));
5497 
5498  // check for remapping of shaders for vertex lighting
5499  s = "vertexremapshader";
5500  if (!Q_strncmp(keyname, s, strlen(s)))
5501  {
5502  s = strchr(value, ';');
5503  if (!s)
5504  {
5505  Ren_Warning("WARNING: no semi colon in vertexshaderremap '%s'\n", value);
5506  break;
5507  }
5508  *s++ = 0;
5509 
5510  //if (r_vertexLight->integer)
5511  //{
5512  //R_RemapShader(value, s, "0");
5513  //}
5514  continue;
5515  }
5516 
5517  // check for remapping of shaders
5518  s = "remapshader";
5519  if (!Q_strncmp(keyname, s, strlen(s)))
5520  {
5521  s = strchr(value, ';');
5522  if (!s)
5523  {
5524  Ren_Warning("WARNING: no semi colon in shaderremap '%s'\n", value);
5525  break;
5526  }
5527  *s++ = 0;
5528  R_RemapShader(value, s, "0");
5529  continue;
5530  }
5531 
5532  // check for a different grid size
5533  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "gridsize"))
5534  {
5535  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &w->lightGridSize[0], &w->lightGridSize[1], &w->lightGridSize[2]);
5536  continue;
5537  }
5538  // check for ambient color
5539  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "_color") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "color"))
5540  {
5541  if (r_forceAmbient->value <= 0)
5542  {
5543  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &tr.worldEntity.ambientLight[0], &tr.worldEntity.ambientLight[1],
5544  &tr.worldEntity.ambientLight[2]);
5545  }
5546  }
5547  // check for ambient scale constant
5548  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "ambientColor") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "ambient") || !Q_stricmp(keyname, "_ambient"))
5549  {
5550  // FIXME: bypass r_ambientScale in R_SetupEntityLighting so map maker can set ambient scale for entities?
5551  // ? = atof(value);
5552  }
5553  // check for fog color
5554  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "fogColor"))
5555  {
5556  sscanf(value, "%f %f %f", &tr.fogColor[0], &tr.fogColor[1], &tr.fogColor[2]);
5557  }
5558  // check for fog density
5559  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "fogDensity"))
5560  {
5561  tr.fogDensity = atof(value);
5562  }
5563 
5564  // check for deluxe mapping support
5565  /*if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "deluxeMapping") && !Q_stricmp(value, "1"))
5566  {
5567  Ren_Developer("map features directional light mapping\n");
5568  tr.worldDeluxeMapping = qtrue;
5569  continue;
5570  }*/
5571  // check for mapOverBrightBits override
5572  else if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "mapOverBrightBits"))
5573  {
5574  tr.mapOverBrightBits = Q_bound(0, atof(value), 3);
5575  }
5576 
5577  // check for deluxe mapping provided by NetRadiant's q3map2
5578  /*if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "_q3map2_cmdline"))
5579  {
5580  s = strstr(value, "-deluxe");
5581  if (s)
5582  {
5583  Ren_Developer("map features directional light mapping\n");
5584  tr.worldDeluxeMapping = qtrue;
5585  }
5586  continue;
5587  }*/
5588 
5589 
5590  // check for HDR light mapping support
5591  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "hdrRGBE") && !Q_stricmp(value, "1"))
5592  {
5593  Ren_Developer("map features HDR light mapping\n");
5594  tr.worldHDR_RGBE = qtrue;
5595  continue;
5596  }
5597 
5598  if (!Q_stricmp(keyname, "classname") && Q_stricmp(value, "worldspawn"))
5599  {
5600  Ren_Warning("WARNING: unexpected worldspawn found '%s'\n", value);
5601  continue;
5602  }
5603  }
5604 
5605  //Ren_Print("-----------\n%s\n----------\n", p);
5606 
5607  R_LoadLights(p);
5608 }
5609 
5616 qboolean R_GetEntityToken(char *buffer, size_t size)
5617 {
5618  const char *s;
5619 
5620  s = COM_Parse2(&s_worldData.entityParsePoint);
5621  Q_strncpyz(buffer, s, size);
5622  if (!s_worldData.entityParsePoint || !s[0])
5623  {
5624  s_worldData.entityParsePoint = s_worldData.entityString;
5625  return qfalse;
5626  }
5627  else
5628  {
5629  return qtrue;
5630  }
5631 }
5632 
5638 static void R_PrecacheInteraction(trRefLight_t *light, bspSurface_t *surface)
5639 {
5640  interactionCache_t *iaCache;
5641 
5642  iaCache = (interactionCache_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*iaCache), h_low);
5643  Com_AddToGrowList(&s_interactions, iaCache);
5644 
5645  // connect to interaction grid
5646  if (!light->firstInteractionCache)
5647  {
5648  light->firstInteractionCache = iaCache;
5649  }
5650 
5651  if (light->lastInteractionCache)
5652  {
5653  light->lastInteractionCache->next = iaCache;
5654  }
5655 
5656  light->lastInteractionCache = iaCache;
5657 
5658  iaCache->next = NULL;
5659  iaCache->surface = surface;
5660 
5661  iaCache->redundant = qfalse;
5662 }
5663 
5664 /*
5665  * @brief R_BuildShadowVolume
5666  * @param[in] numTriangles
5667  * @param[in] triangles
5668  * @param[in] numVerts
5669  * @param[out] indexes
5670  * @return
5671  *
5672  * @note Unused
5673 static int R_BuildShadowVolume(int numTriangles, const srfTriangle_t * triangles, int numVerts, int indexes[SHADER_MAX_INDEXES])
5674 {
5675  int i;
5676  int numIndexes;
5677  const srfTriangle_t *tri;
5678 
5679  // calculate zfail shadow volume
5680  numIndexes = 0;
5681 
5682  // set up indices for silhouette edges
5683  for(i = 0, tri = triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
5684  {
5685  if(!sh.facing[i])
5686  {
5687  continue;
5688  }
5689 
5690  if(tri->neighbors[0] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[0]])
5691  {
5692  indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[1];
5693  indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[0];
5694  indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[0] + numVerts;
5695 
5696  indexes[numIndexes + 3] = tri->indexes[1];
5697  indexes[numIndexes + 4] = tri->indexes[0] + numVerts;
5698  indexes[numIndexes + 5] = tri->indexes[1] + numVerts;
5699 
5700  numIndexes += 6;
5701  }
5702 
5703  if(tri->neighbors[1] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[1]])
5704  {
5705  indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[2];
5706  indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[1];
5707  indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[1] + numVerts;
5708 
5709  indexes[numIndexes + 3] = tri->indexes[2];
5710  indexes[numIndexes + 4] = tri->indexes[1] + numVerts;
5711  indexes[numIndexes + 5] = tri->indexes[2] + numVerts;
5712 
5713  numIndexes += 6;
5714  }
5715 
5716  if(tri->neighbors[2] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[2]])
5717  {
5718  indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[0];
5719  indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[2];
5720  indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[2] + numVerts;
5721 
5722  indexes[numIndexes + 3] = tri->indexes[0];
5723  indexes[numIndexes + 4] = tri->indexes[2] + numVerts;
5724  indexes[numIndexes + 5] = tri->indexes[0] + numVerts;
5725 
5726  numIndexes += 6;
5727  }
5728  }
5729 
5730  // set up indices for light and dark caps
5731  for(i = 0, tri = triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
5732  {
5733  if(!sh.facing[i])
5734  {
5735  continue;
5736  }
5737 
5738  // light cap
5739  indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[0];
5740  indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[1];
5741  indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[2];
5742 
5743  // dark cap
5744  indexes[numIndexes + 3] = tri->indexes[2] + numVerts;
5745  indexes[numIndexes + 4] = tri->indexes[1] + numVerts;
5746  indexes[numIndexes + 5] = tri->indexes[0] + numVerts;
5747 
5748  numIndexes += 6;
5749  }
5750 
5751  return numIndexes;
5752 }
5753 */
5754 
5755 /*
5756  * @brief R_BuildShadowPlanes
5757  * @param[in] numTriangles
5758  * @param[in] triangles
5759  * @param[in] numVerts
5760  * @param[in] verts
5761  * @param[out] shadowPlanes
5762  * @param[in] light
5763  * @return
5764  *
5765  * @note Unused
5766 static int R_BuildShadowPlanes(int numTriangles, const srfTriangle_t * triangles, int numVerts, srfVert_t * verts,
5767  cplane_t shadowPlanes[SHADER_MAX_TRIANGLES], trRefLight_t * light)
5768 {
5769  int i;
5770  int numShadowPlanes;
5771  const srfTriangle_t *tri;
5772  vec3_t pos[3];
5773 
5774 // vec3_t lightDir;
5775  vec4_t plane;
5776 
5777  if(r_noShadowFrustums->integer)
5778  {
5779  return 0;
5780  }
5781 
5782  // calculate shadow frustum
5783  numShadowPlanes = 0;
5784 
5785  // set up indices for silhouette edges
5786  for(i = 0, tri = triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
5787  {
5788  if(!sh.facing[i])
5789  {
5790  continue;
5791  }
5792 
5793  if(tri->neighbors[0] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[0]])
5794  {
5795  //indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[1];
5796  //indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[0];
5797  //indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[0] + numVerts;
5798 
5799  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, pos[0]);
5800  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, pos[1]);
5801  VectorCopy(light->origin, pos[2]);
5802 
5803  // extrude the infinite one
5804  //VectorSubtract(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, light->origin, lightDir);
5805  //VectorAdd(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, lightDir, pos[2]);
5806  //VectorNormalize(lightDir);
5807  //VectorMA(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, 9999, lightDir, pos[2]);
5808 
5809  if(PlaneFromPoints(plane, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
5810  {
5811  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[0] = plane[0];
5812  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[1] = plane[1];
5813  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[2] = plane[2];
5814  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].dist = plane[3];
5815 
5816  numShadowPlanes++;
5817  }
5818  else
5819  {
5820  return 0;
5821  }
5822  }
5823 
5824  if(tri->neighbors[1] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[1]])
5825  {
5826  //indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[2];
5827  //indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[1];
5828  //indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[1] + numVerts;
5829 
5830  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, pos[0]);
5831  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, pos[1]);
5832  VectorCopy(light->origin, pos[2]);
5833 
5834  // extrude the infinite one
5835  //VectorSubtract(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, light->origin, lightDir);
5836  //VectorNormalize(lightDir);
5837  //VectorMA(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, 9999, lightDir, pos[2]);
5838 
5839  if(PlaneFromPoints(plane, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
5840  {
5841  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[0] = plane[0];
5842  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[1] = plane[1];
5843  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[2] = plane[2];
5844  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].dist = plane[3];
5845 
5846  numShadowPlanes++;
5847  }
5848  else
5849  {
5850  return 0;
5851  }
5852  }
5853 
5854  if(tri->neighbors[2] < 0 || !sh.facing[tri->neighbors[2]])
5855  {
5856  //indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[0];
5857  //indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[2];
5858  //indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[2] + numVerts;
5859 
5860  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, pos[0]);
5861  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, pos[1]);
5862  VectorCopy(light->origin, pos[2]);
5863 
5864  // extrude the infinite one
5865  //VectorSubtract(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, light->origin, lightDir);
5866  //VectorNormalize(lightDir);
5867  //VectorMA(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, 9999, lightDir, pos[2]);
5868 
5869  if(PlaneFromPoints(plane, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
5870  {
5871  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[0] = plane[0];
5872  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[1] = plane[1];
5873  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[2] = plane[2];
5874  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].dist = plane[3];
5875 
5876  numShadowPlanes++;
5877  }
5878  else
5879  {
5880  return 0;
5881  }
5882  }
5883  }
5884 
5885  // set up indices for light and dark caps
5886  for(i = 0, tri = triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
5887  {
5888  if(!sh.facing[i])
5889  {
5890  continue;
5891  }
5892 
5893  // light cap
5894  //indexes[numIndexes + 0] = tri->indexes[0];
5895  //indexes[numIndexes + 1] = tri->indexes[1];
5896  //indexes[numIndexes + 2] = tri->indexes[2];
5897 
5898  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, pos[0]);
5899  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, pos[1]);
5900  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, pos[2]);
5901 
5902  if(PlaneFromPoints(plane, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
5903  {
5904  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[0] = plane[0];
5905  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[1] = plane[1];
5906  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].normal[2] = plane[2];
5907  shadowPlanes[numShadowPlanes].dist = plane[3];
5908 
5909  numShadowPlanes++;
5910  }
5911  else
5912  {
5913  return 0;
5914  }
5915  }
5916 
5917 
5918  for(i = 0; i < numShadowPlanes; i++)
5919  {
5920  //vec_t length, ilength;
5921 
5922  shadowPlanes[i].type = PLANE_NON_AXIAL;
5923 
5924 
5925  SetPlaneSignbits(&shadowPlanes[i]);
5926  }
5927 
5928  return numShadowPlanes;
5929 }
5930 */
5931 
5939 static qboolean R_PrecacheGenericSurfInteraction(srfGeneric_t *surf, shader_t *shader, trRefLight_t *light)
5940 {
5941  // check if bounds intersect
5942  if (!BoundsIntersect(light->worldBounds[0], light->worldBounds[1], surf->bounds[0], surf->bounds[1]))
5943  {
5944  return qfalse;
5945  }
5946 
5947  return qtrue;
5948 }
5949 
5955 static void R_PrecacheInteractionSurface(bspSurface_t *surf, trRefLight_t *light)
5956 {
5957  qboolean intersects;
5958 
5959  if (surf->lightCount == s_lightCount)
5960  {
5961  return; // already checked this surface
5962  }
5963  surf->lightCount = s_lightCount;
5964 
5965  // skip all surfaces that don't matter for lighting only pass
5966  if (surf->shader->isSky || (!surf->shader->interactLight && surf->shader->noShadows))
5967  {
5968  return;
5969  }
5970 
5971  switch (*surf->data)
5972  {
5973  case SF_FACE:
5974  case SF_GRID:
5975  case SF_TRIANGLES:
5976  intersects = R_PrecacheGenericSurfInteraction((srfGeneric_t *) surf->data, surf->shader, light);
5977  break;
5978  default:
5979  intersects = qfalse;
5980  break;
5981  }
5982 
5983  if (intersects)
5984  {
5985  R_PrecacheInteraction(light, surf);
5986  }
5987 }
5988 
5994 static void R_RecursivePrecacheInteractionNode(bspNode_t *node, trRefLight_t *light)
5995 {
5996  int r;
5997 
5998  do
5999  {
6000  // light already hit node
6001  if (node->lightCount == s_lightCount)
6002  {
6003  return;
6004  }
6005 
6006  node->lightCount = s_lightCount;
6007 
6008  if (node->contents != -1)
6009  {
6010  break;
6011  }
6012 
6013  // node is just a decision point, so go down both sides
6014  // since we don't care about sort orders, just go positive to negative
6015  r = BoxOnPlaneSide(light->worldBounds[0], light->worldBounds[1], node->plane);
6016 
6017  switch (r)
6018  {
6019  case 1:
6020  node = node->children[0];
6021  break;
6022  case 2:
6023  node = node->children[1];
6024  break;
6025  case 3:
6026  default:
6027  // recurse down the children, front side first
6028  R_RecursivePrecacheInteractionNode(node->children[0], light);
6029 
6030  // tail recurse
6031  node = node->children[1];
6032  break;
6033  }
6034  }
6035  while (1);
6036  {
6037  // leaf node, so add mark surfaces
6038  int c;
6039  bspSurface_t *surf, **mark;
6040 
6041  // add the individual surfaces
6042  mark = node->markSurfaces;
6043  c = node->numMarkSurfaces;
6044 
6045  while (c--)
6046  {
6047  // the surface may have already been added if it
6048  // spans multiple leafs
6049  surf = *mark;
6050  R_PrecacheInteractionSurface(surf, light);
6051  mark++;
6052  }
6053  }
6054 }
6055 
6061 static void R_RecursiveAddInteractionNode(bspNode_t *node, trRefLight_t *light)
6062 {
6063  int r;
6064 
6065  do
6066  {
6067  // light already hit node
6068  if (node->lightCount == s_lightCount)
6069  {
6070  return;
6071  }
6072 
6073  node->lightCount = s_lightCount;
6074 
6075  if (node->contents != -1)
6076  {
6077  break;
6078  }
6079 
6080  // node is just a decision point, so go down both sides
6081  // since we don't care about sort orders, just go positive to negative
6082  r = BoxOnPlaneSide(light->worldBounds[0], light->worldBounds[1], node->plane);
6083 
6084  switch (r)
6085  {
6086  case 1:
6087  node = node->children[0];
6088  break;
6089  case 2:
6090  node = node->children[1];
6091  break;
6092  case 3:
6093  default:
6094  // recurse down the children, front side first
6095  R_RecursiveAddInteractionNode(node->children[0], light);
6096 
6097  // tail recurse
6098  node = node->children[1];
6099  break;
6100  }
6101  }
6102  while (1);
6103 
6104  {
6105  //leaf node
6106  vec3_t worldBounds[2];
6107 
6108  VectorCopy(node->mins, worldBounds[0]);
6109  VectorCopy(node->maxs, worldBounds[1]);
6110 
6111  if (node->numMarkSurfaces > 0 && R_CullLightWorldBounds(light, worldBounds) != CULL_OUT)
6112  {
6113  link_t *l;
6114 
6115  l = (link_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*l), h_low);
6116  InitLink(l, node);
6117 
6118  InsertLink(l, &light->leafs);
6119 
6120  light->leafs.numElements++;
6121  }
6122  }
6123 }
6124 
6134 int R_ShadowFrustumCullWorldBounds(int numShadowPlanes, cplane_t *shadowPlanes, vec3_t worldBounds[2])
6135 {
6136  int i;
6137  cplane_t *plane;
6138  qboolean anyClip;
6139  int r;
6140 
6141  if (!numShadowPlanes)
6142  {
6143  return CULL_CLIP;
6144  }
6145 
6146  // check against frustum planes
6147  anyClip = qfalse;
6148  for (i = 0; i < numShadowPlanes; i++)
6149  {
6150  plane = &shadowPlanes[i];
6151  r = BoxOnPlaneSide(worldBounds[0], worldBounds[1], plane);
6152 
6153  if (r == 2)
6154  {
6155  // completely outside frustum
6156  return CULL_OUT;
6157  }
6158  if (r == 3)
6159  {
6160  anyClip = qtrue;
6161  }
6162  }
6163 
6164  if (!anyClip)
6165  {
6166  // completely inside frustum
6167  return CULL_IN;
6168  }
6169 
6170  // partially clipped
6171  return CULL_CLIP;
6172 }
6173 
6179 static interactionVBO_t *R_CreateInteractionVBO(trRefLight_t *light)
6180 {
6181  interactionVBO_t *iaVBO;
6182 
6183  iaVBO = (interactionVBO_t *)ri.Hunk_Alloc(sizeof(*iaVBO), h_low);
6184 
6185  // connect to interaction grid
6186  if (!light->firstInteractionVBO)
6187  {
6188  light->firstInteractionVBO = iaVBO;
6189  }
6190 
6191  if (light->lastInteractionVBO)
6192  {
6193  light->lastInteractionVBO->next = iaVBO;
6194  }
6195 
6196  light->lastInteractionVBO = iaVBO;
6197  iaVBO->next = NULL;
6198 
6199  return iaVBO;
6200 }
6201 
6208 static int InteractionCacheCompare(const void *a, const void *b)
6209 {
6210  interactionCache_t *aa = *(interactionCache_t **) a;
6211  interactionCache_t *bb = *(interactionCache_t **) b;
6212 
6213  // shader first
6214  if (aa->surface->shader < bb->surface->shader)
6215  {
6216  return -1;
6217  }
6218  else if (aa->surface->shader > bb->surface->shader)
6219  {
6220  return 1;
6221  }
6222 
6223  // then alphaTest
6224  if (aa->surface->shader->alphaTest < bb->surface->shader->alphaTest)
6225  {
6226  return -1;
6227  }
6228  else if (aa->surface->shader->alphaTest > bb->surface->shader->alphaTest)
6229  {
6230  return 1;
6231  }
6232 
6233  return 0;
6234 }
6235 
6245 static int UpdateLightTriangles(const srfVert_t *verts, int numTriangles, srfTriangle_t *triangles, shader_t *surfaceShader,
6246  trRefLight_t *light)
6247 {
6248  int i;
6249  srfTriangle_t *tri;
6250  int numFacing = 0;
6251 
6252 #if 1
6253  vec3_t lightDirection;
6254 
6255  vec3_t pos[3];
6256  vec4_t triPlane;
6257  float d;
6258 #endif
6259 
6260  for (i = 0, tri = triangles; i < numTriangles; i++, tri++)
6261  {
6262 #if 1
6263  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[0]].xyz, pos[0]);
6264  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[1]].xyz, pos[1]);
6265  VectorCopy(verts[tri->indexes[2]].xyz, pos[2]);
6266 
6267  if (PlaneFromPoints(triPlane, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
6268  {
6269  if (light->l.rlType == RL_DIRECTIONAL)
6270  {
6271  // light direction is from surface to light
6272 #if 1
6273  VectorCopy(tr.sunDirection, lightDirection); // use sun light
6274 #else
6275  VectorCopy(light->direction, lightDirection); // use global light
6276 #endif
6277 
6278  d = DotProduct(triPlane, lightDirection);
6279 
6280  if (surfaceShader->cullType == CT_TWO_SIDED || (d > 0 && surfaceShader->cullType != CT_BACK_SIDED))
6281  {
6282  tri->facingLight = qtrue; // surfaceShader->cullType == CT_TWO_SIDED || ( d > 0 && surfaceShader->cullType != CT_BACK_SIDED );
6283  }
6284  else
6285  {
6286  tri->facingLight = qfalse;
6287  }
6288  }
6289  else
6290  {
6291  // check if light origin is behind triangle
6292  d = DotProduct(triPlane, light->origin) - triPlane[3];
6293
